activity.comments: L/D TCP guns assembly. All TCP guns 100% fired.
Clean and clear rig floor for RIH TCP guns, prepare TCP guns handling equipment.
Prepare TCP guns and TCP accesories meanwhile mixing KCL and brine filtration ongoing.

Detonate TCP guns #1 and perforate well at 6570-6610 ft MD and 6755-6770 ft MD intervals. - Cement unit pressure up string to 500 psi, hold 1 minutes. - Pressure up to 2100 psi to trigger time-delay firing head, hold 3 minutes. - Pressure up and open POUV at 2660 psi, pressure drop to zero. - Observe trip tank volume increase 2 bbls and then static. - Observe string shcok after few minutes later. Trip tanks volume drop 3 bbls and then static. - Flow check, well static.

PJSM. M/U FOSV, SES, FOSV and Pup Joint. R/U surface line from cement unit to string.
Pick up string 3.43 ft to position TCP guns #1 on depth.

PJSM. M/U SES assembly. R/U E-line equipment. M/U and RIH GR-CCL-Tractor for correlation run. Activate Tractor at 6150 ft WL.
Observe TCP #1 RA pip tag at 6386.5 ft WL (supposed to be 6383.07 ft WL) TCP guns #1 was 3.43 ft deeper.
POOH GR-CCL-Tractor. R/D E-line equipment.
Continue RIH 4-1/2" TCP HSD, 5 SPF, HMX, PJ Omega 4505 guns #1 from 3340 ft to 6770 ftMD. - Fill up string with 9.1 ppg KCl brine every five stands. - TCP guns enter 7" TOL with no issue.
R/D surface line. L/D FOSV, SES, FOSV and Pup Joint. POOH TCP guns #1 from 6770 ft to 290 ft MD.

opsReport.sum24Hr: RIH TCP HSD, 5 SPF, HMX, PJ Omega 4505 guns #1 from 3440 ft to 6770 ft MD. E-line GR-CCL-Tractor correlation run. Space out. Detonate TCP guns #1 and perforate well at 6570-6610 ft MD and 6755-6770 ft MD intervals. Well static. POOH TCP guns #1 from 6770 ft to 290 ft MD. POOH and L/D TCP guns #1. Prepare TCP guns and handling equipment
opsReport.forecast24Hr: Continue prepare for TCP guns. RIH TCP guns #2. E-line GR-CCL correlation run. Detonate TCP guns #2. POOH TCP guns #2.

activity.comments: PJSM. Detonate TCP guns #2 and perforate well at 5718 - 5883 ftMD, 5960 - 5980 ftMD and 6015 - 6055 ftMD intervals. - Cement unit pressure up string to 500 psi, hold 1 minutes. - Pressure up to 2150 psi to trigger time-delay firing head, hold 2 minutes. - Increase pressure to open POUV at 2600 psi, pressure drop to zero. - Observe guns fired - string shock after 7 minutes.
Flow check for 10 minutes - well static. Rig down line and SES assembly. POOH wiht TCP guns assemly run #2 to 440 ftMD.
Flowcheck for 10 minutes - well static. Break and L/D TCP guns assembly. All TCP guns 100% fired.
Change out BX elevator from 4" to 5.5". Continue RIH TCP guns Run #2 on 5-1/2" DP from 1487 ft to 6056 ft MD. - Fill up string with 9.1 ppg KCl brine every five stands.

PJSM. MU TCP guns assembly Run #2: 4-1/2" TCP guns 5 spf (6015-6055 ftMD interval), Spacer, 4-1/2" TCP guns 5 spf (5960-5980 ftMD), Spacer, 4-1/2" TCP guns 5 spf (5718-5883 ftMD),Safety Spacer, Dual Hydraulic firing head, 1jt 2-7/8" tubing, POUV valve, 1jt 2-7/8" tubing, X-Overs, 1std 4" DP, RA Piptag (installed in DP thread).
RIH TCP guns #2 on 4" DP to 1487 ft MD.
Prepare TCP guns, Dual hydraulic firing head and production valve - POUV.

M/U SES assembly. R/U Eline equipment. MU & RIH GR-CCL tool for depth correlation.
Observe TCP #2 RA pip tag at 5519.5 ft WL (supposed to be 5518.92 ft WL) TCP guns #2 was 0.58 ft deeper.
POOH GR-CCL. R/D E-line equipment.

opsReport.sum24Hr: RIH TCP HSD, 5 SPF, HMX, PJ Omega 4505 guns #2 to 6056 ft MD. E-line GR-CCL correlation run. Space out. Fire TCP guns #2. POOH and L/D TCP guns #2
opsReport.forecast24Hr: Prepare TCP guns #3. M/U and RIH TCP guns #3. E-line GR-CCL correlation run. Space out. Fire TCP guns #3.

activity.comments:
Pull string 0.22 ft to position TCP guns on depth.
Detonate TCP guns #3 and perforate well at 5095 - 5153 ftMD, 5240 - 5261 ftMD, 5396 - 5412 ftMD and 5442 - 5453 ftMD intervals.
- Cement unit pressure up string to 500 psi, hold 1 minutes. - Pressure up to 2250 psi to trigger time-delay firing head, hold 2 minutes. - Increase pressure to open POUV at 2800 psi, pressure drop to zero. - Observe guns fired - string shock after 7 minutes.

PJSM. Prepare and M/U TCP guns assembly Run #3: 4-1/2" TCP 5 SPF - HSD - PJ Omega 4505 guns, Dual Hydraulic Firing Head, 1jt 2-7/8" tubing, POUV valve, 1jt 2-7/8" tubing, X-Overs, 1std 4" DP, RA Piptag (installed in DP thread).
RIH TCP guns #3 on 4" DP to 558 ft MD.

M/U SES assembly. R/U Eline equipment. MU & RIH GR-CCL tool for depth correlation.
TCP RA pip tag found at depth 4896 ftWL (TCP string pip tag at depth 4895.78 ftMD). TCP guns too deep 0.22 ft.
POOH GR-CCL. R/D E-line equipment.

RIH TCP guns #3 on 5-1/2" DP from 558 ft to 5453 ft MD.
Manually fill up string with 9.1 ppg filtered KCl brine every 5 stands.

opsReport.sum24Hr: Prepare and RIH TCP HSD, 5 SPF, HMX, PJ Omega 4505 guns #3 to 5453 ft MD. E-line GR-CCL correlation run. Space out. Fire TCP guns #3.
opsReport.forecast24Hr: POOH and L/D TCP guns #3. M/U and RIH 7" x 9-5/8" Deburring BHA. Deburr perforation intervals. Displace hole to packer fluid. Jet BOP and Wellhead area.

activity.comments:
Deburr perforations interval 5095-5153 ft, 5240-5261 ft, 5396-5412, 5442-5453, 5718-5883, 5960-5980 ft, 6015-6055 ft, 6570-6610 ft, 6755-6770 ft MD. Parameters 200-300 gpm, 175-400 psi, 20-30 RPM, 6 kft-lbs with 30 ft overlap up and down across perforation intervals. Perform slide test with no pumps and no rotation after deburring, no drag observe.
Observe 20 bph dynamic losses at 400 gpm at the begining deburring, adjust flow rate to 200-300 gpm.

Pump 30 bbls of HiVis and circulate hole clean with 350 gpm, 500-550 psi while reciprocate string with 20-25RPM, 5- 7 Kft.lbs.
Displace hole to 9.1 ppg packer fluid with 350 gpm, 500-550 psi while reciprocate string with 5-10 RPM, 2-3 Kft.lbs.
Flowcheck well - static.
POOH deburring BHA from 6800 ft to 2620 ftMD.

PJSM. M/U and RIH Deburring BHA to 1369 ft MD. 6-1/8" PDC Bit (open nozzle) 3-1/2" Bit Sub 6” Watermelon Mill 2 EA Grabitz Casing Magnet for 7" Casing X/O Sub (3 1/2" IF P x XT39 B) 5 stand 4" HWDP 8 stands + double 4" DP XO (XT39 pin X 3.5" IF box) XO (3.5" IF pin X 4.5" IF box) 8-1/2” Watermelon Mill 2 EA Grabitz Casing Magnet for 9-5/8" Casing Wellbore filter for 9-5/8” Casing X/O Sub (4 1/2" IF P x HT55 B)
Fill up string and take parameters: PU/SO/FRW: 112/118/115 Klbs, 15RPM, 1.5 Kft.lbs. 300 gpm, 270 psi.

Flow check 10 minutes, well static. L/D TCP guns #3. Confirm 100% guns fired.
Clean clear rig floor, change out 4" DP to BX elevator.
Flow check 10 minutes, well static. POOH TCP guns #3 from 5453 ft to 459 ftMD
RIH Deburring BHA on 5-1/2" DP from 1369 ft to 5694 ft MD.

opsReport.sum24Hr: POOH and L/D TCP guns #3. RIH Deburring BHA. Deburring perforation intervals. Displace hole to 9.1 ppg packer fluid. POOH Deburring BHA from 6800 to 2620 ftMD.
opsReport.forecast24Hr: Continue POOH Deburing BHA from 2620 ft to 1590 ftMD. M/U BOP Jetting Sub. Jet BOP and Wellhead area. POOH and L/D Deburring BHA. Retrieve wear bushing. RIH 4-1/2" Upper Completion.

activity.comments:
Continue RIH 4-1/2" Upper Completion to 1916 ftMD. Upper Completion jewelleries: - Indexing Mule Shoe - X Landing Nipple with pre-installed PX plug & prong - HAL SSD XU (Jar UP to OPEN), 4-1/2" 12.6# L80 13Cr VAM TOP - HAL Zone Guard, 4-1/2" 12.6# TSB - HAL SSD XU (Jar UP to OPEN), 4-1/2" 12.6# L80 13Cr VAM TOP - HAL Zone Guard, 4-1/2" 12.6# TSB - HAL SSD XU (Jar UP to OPEN), 4-1/2" 12.6# L80 13Cr VAM TOP - SUP 9-5/8" Production Packer, 4-1/2" 12.6# TSH Blue - HAL SSD XU (Jar UP to OPEN), 4-1/2" 12.6# L80 13Cr VAM TOP - SUP 9-5/8" Production Packer, 4-1/2" 12.6# TSH Blue - HAL SSD XU (Jar UP to OPEN), 4-1/2" 12.6# L80 13Cr VAM TOP - SUP 9-5/8" Production Packer, 4-1/2" 12.6# TSH Blue
- Drift 4-1/2" 12.6 ppf L80 13Cr TSH tubing with 3.833" teflon rabbit. - Fill up string with 9.1 ppg packer fluid every 10 joints.

M/U SLB Gauge Mandrel.
Install PDHG connected to TEC cable. Pressure test PDHG port head adaptor to 300/7500 psi (5/10 minutes).
Connect PDHG to SAU and record PDHG reading - OK (ambient 14.7 psi, 28.8 °C) . Install cable cross coupling clamp on PDHG.
- Regularly check gauge acquisition while RIH.

RIH 4-1/2" upper completion string from 1916 ft to 3162 ft MD.
- M/U 2ea GLM - Install cable cross coupling clamp on each tubing collar. - Drift 4-1/2" 12.6 ppf L80 13Cr TSH tubing with 3.833" teflon rabbit. - Monitor well on trip tank while RIH - observe no losses
Fill up string with 9.1 ppg packer fluid. R/U pumping swage and pressure test PX-plug to 300/3500 psi for 5/5 mins - good test.

PJSM. M/U Indexing Mule Shoe, 4-1/2" pup joint, X Landing Nipple with preinstalled PX plug & prong and 1 jts of 4-1/2" tubing. RIH 4-1/2" upper completion to 66 ft MD.
Note: Function test Indexing Mule Shoe at rig floor, good. Visually check inside X Landing Nipple, no debris.

P/U Wear Bushing RT. Retrieve 9-5/8" Wear Bushing. Record distance RT - Tubing Hanger landing point: 86.45 ft.
M/U FMC jetting tool. Drain BOP and riser. Jet Tubing Hanger landing area with 130 gpm, 500 psi, 5 RPM.

L/D 9-5/8" Filter, Grabitz Casing Magnets and 8-1/2" Water Melon Mill. Rack back 8 stands of 4" DP. L/D 7" Casing Magnet, 6" Water Melon and 6-1/8" PDC bit.
Collect debris from 7" and 9-5/8" filter and casing magnets: 13 Kgs and flowline ditch magnet: 1 Kg.

M/U BOP jettng sub. RIH BOP Jetting tool below BOP. Jet BOP and wellhead area with 700 gpm, 230 psi, 5 RPM, 1 Kft.lbs while reciprocate the string. Pump 20 bbl of HiVis and circulate hole clean with 700 gpm, 230 psi
Rig up Varco 4-1/2" tubing power tong and handling equipment. R/U SLB PDHG cable sheave wheel on A-fram. Feed the cable from the reel and secure same.
Continue POOH Deburring BHA from 2620 ft to 1590 ftMD.

opsReport.sum24Hr: POOH Deburring BHA from 2620 ft to 1590 ft MD. Jet and wash BOP with BOP jetting tool. POOH and L/D Deburring BHA. Retrieve wear bushing. Jet wellhead with FMC jetting tool. RIH 4-1/2" Upper Completion to 3162 ftMD.
opsReport.forecast24Hr: Continue RIH 4-1/2" Upper Completion. M/U and land FMC tubing hanger at Unihead. Set 9-5/8" production packers and 7" Zone Guard packers. Inflow test TRSV. Pressure test top production packer. Set BPV. N/D BOP

activity.comments:
Make up 4-1/2" tubing landing joint. Take PU/SO weight: 152/141 klbs. Drain BOP and riser. RIH completion string while strapping the landing joint.
Land TH at 86.4 ft MD in Unihead. Pressure test TH seal 5000 psi for 5 minutes - good test. Remove elevator, back off THRT 6 turns to lockTH in profile. Perfrom pull test to 169 klbs (20 klbs overpull).
1. Tubing Hanger at 86.4 ftMD 2. TRSV (SN: 671711) at 505 ftMD 3. GLM #30 (SN: TS #6596-001) at 1882 ftMD 4. GLM #31 (SN: TS #6596-017) at 3138 ftMD 5. GLM #32 (SN: TS #6596-016) at 3887 ftMD 6. GLM #27 (SN: TS #6596-015) at 4466 ftMD 7. PDHG Mandrel at 4884 ftMD 8. 9-5/8" Prod. Packer #16 (SN: TS #6568-3) at 5058 ftMD 9. SSD #43 (SN: MY2898695-04) at 5089 ftMD 10. 9-5/8" Prod. Packer #15 (SN: TS #6568-1) at 5183 ftMD 11. SSD #42 (SN: MY2898696-04) at 5401 ftMD 12. 9-5/8" Prod. Packer #14 (SN: TS #6568-2) at 5500 ftMD 13. SSD #41 (SN: MY2898696-08) at 5774 ftMD 14. 7" Zone Guard #04 (SN: 0004192349-01) at 6306 ftMD 15. SSD #40 (SN: MY2898694-01) at 6578 ftMD 16. 7" Zone Guard #03 (SN: 0004192348-03) at 6672 ftMD 17. SSD #38 (SN: MY2898696-03) at 6695 ftMD 18. X-LN #5 (SN: TS #6660-2) at 6789 ftMD 19. Indexing Muleshoe (SN: 675054) at 6805 ftMD

PJSM. M/U Tubing swage. Connect line and pressure test to 4000 psi against gate valve for 5 minutes - good test.
Line up cement unit to string. Pressure up string in stages to 3500 psi for setting Superior 9-5/8" production packer and Halliburton 7" Zone Guard packer, Hold pressure for 10 minutes at final pressure. Pumped volume 1.7 bbls. Observe packer setting at ~1200 - 1600 psi.
Bleed down tubing pressure to 2500 psi. Close TRSV and bleed down pressure above TRSV flapper to 500 psi. In flow test TRSV for 10 minutes - observe no pressure increase. Equalise pressure across TRSV flapper to 2000 psi. Open TRSV and bserve pressure increase to 2400 psi - good indication TRSV open. Increase tubing pressure to 2500 psi and close Lo Torque valve isolating string.
Open A-annulus side valve and pressure up annulus to 2000 psi for 10 minutes to test packer - good test. Bleed off annulus presssure. Pumped and bleed off volume 2.5 bbls.
Equalise Lo-torque valve to 2500 psi and bleed off tubing pressure. Close TRSV.
- Monitor tubing pressure throughout setting operation at PDHG.

Rig down tubing swage and disconnect test line. Cut TRSV control line and stop PDHG acqiuistion.
Release tubing hanger landing string, break out THRT.

RIH 4-1/2" upper completion string from 6300 ft to 6714 ft MD. - Install cable cross coupling clamp on each tubing collar. - Drift 4-1/2" 12.6 ppf L80 13Cr TSH tubing with 3.833" teflon rabbit. - Monitor well on trip tank while RIH, static.

P/U and M/U 4-1/2" TRSV.
Function test TRSV 3 times to 5000 psi, TRSV opening pressure 1600 psi. Bleed off volume 72 cc each. Pressure test TRSV to 6500 psi for 15 mins - good test, observe no visual leak. Bleed off volume 90 cc. Open TRSV with 5000 psi, isolate control line on reel. Record PDHG reading 1960 psi, 74 °C

RIH 4-1/2" upper completion string from 3162 ft to 6300 ft MD.
- M/U 3ea GLM - Install cable cross coupling clamp on each tubing collar - Drift 4-1/2" 12.6 ppf L80 13Cr TSH tubing with 3.833" teflon rabbit - Monitor well on trip tank while RIH - observe no losses

P/U and M/U tubing hanger & RT assy. Disconnect THRT to allow feeding through CL.
Bleed off TRSV control line pressure. Cut control line & peel off cable sheath. Make 3 wraps around tubing below the tubing hanger. Feed control line through tubing hanger and tighten swagelok fitting.
Stop PDHG acquisition. Cut TEC cable 90 ft & peel off the cable sheath. Feed TEC cable through tubing hanger and tightened swagelok fitting. Make 3 wraps around tubing hanger neck for both TRSV control line and PDHG cable.Connect PDHG to SAU, good data acquisition.
Re-connect tubing hanger running tool.

opsReport.sum24Hr:
Continue RIH 4-1/2" Upper Completion to 6300 ftMD. M/U & RIH TRSV (function test good). Continue RIH RIH 4-1/2" Upper Completion to 6714 ftMD.
M/U and Land FMC tubing hanger at Unihead. Set 9-5/8" production packers and 7" Zone Guard packers. Inflow test TRSV. Pressure test top production packer.
opsReport.forecast24Hr: Set BPV. N/D BOP. Terminate control line and PDHG cable. N/U X-Tree

activity.comments: N/U adaptor and 4-1/16" CT HP riser on top X-Tree to WHP-D top deck. N/U CT dual BOP and function test same, OK. Mmeanwhile M/U HP riser on rig floor.
Lower down & N/U HP Riser on top of CT BOP to rotary table. Disconnect 2" lines from A-annulus and connect to BOP kill port.
Line up cement unit to BOP kill port and pressure test HP riser against swab valve to 300/3500 psi for 5/10 mins, OK.
PJSM. Prepare to N/U 4-1/16" CT HP Riser and CT BOP. Lower down 4-1/16" CT BOP to WHP-D main deck. Breakout X-mass tree swab cap adaptor.
Pressure test cavity to 5000 psi for 10 mins, OK. Retrieve BPV & install TTP. Pressure test X-Tree to 5000 psi for 10 mins, OK.

Clean Tubing Hanger cavity. Wrap CL & TEC cable around TH neck. Feed through TRSV CL & PDHG TEC cable into Unihead exit block adapter and terminated same.
Cycle TRSV with 5000 psi twice, flapper start to open at 1600 psi, bleed off volume 52 ml. Pressure test CL to 6500 psi for 10 mins, OK. Bled off CL pressure to close TRSV, bleed off volume 64 ml.
N/D and secure 18-3/4" 15K BOP on stump.

Clean and clear excess equipment on rig floor.
PJSM. N/D diverter, extention joint and overshot. N/D 24" bell nipple.
N/U 13-5/8" adaptor. R/U lifting sling and lower down X-Tree to platform. N/U X-Tree as per FMC.
Rig down 4-/12" tubing handling equippment and tong.
Set BPV in tubing hanger at 86 ft MD with tee bar.

opsReport.sum24Hr: R/D 4-1/2 Tubing handling equipment. Set BPV. N/D Diverter. N/D BOP & secure on stump. N/D HP Risers. N/U & pressure test X-Tree. N/U 4-1/16" CT HP Riser & CT dual BOP. Presssure test CT HP riser.
opsReport.forecast24Hr: R/U CTU Injector head. Pressure test BOP. Displace CT with 9.1 ppg brine. Rig up and pressure test cleanup temporary line. M/U and RIH tubing clearance BHA.

activity.comments: POOH CT with tubing clearance BHA to surface. (speed 30-40 FPM). Line up annulus to trip tank via MGS. Close swab valve on X-Tree. Bleed off any pressure. Disconnect injector head. L/D Nozzle.

M/U FSV Shifting BHA. Function test shifting tool with 0.7 bbls/650 psi to activate. Connect Injector head.
BHA: 2.1" Dimple connector (2" coil) + 2.38" Motorhead Assembly + 2.12 Ball Circulating Sub + 3.5" Centralizer + 2.125 Maximus Dual Acting Slinger + 2.125" Maximus Dual Acting jar + 2.2" FSV Shifting Tool + 3.5" Centralizer + 2.125" Nozzle.
Pressure test QTS to 300/2500 psi for 5/5 minutes - good test.

RIH CT with FSV shifting tool to 5650 ftCT.
Take PU/SO weight and break circulation with 1 bpm every 1000 ft.
Circulate and flush top of PX plug with 90 bbl of 9.1 ppg Brine. Spot 9 bbls of Hi Vis above PX plug.

Function test, circulate at different flow rate, OK. (0.5 bpm, 150 psi ; 0.75 bpm, 300 psi, 1 bpm, 650 psi)
Inflow test DFCV with 300/2500 psi for 5/10 mins, OK.

M/U tubing clearance BHA.
BHA: 2.1" Dimple connector (2" coil) + 2.125" Motorhead Assembly + 3.6" Centralizer + 2.125 Straight Bar + 2.125" Weight Bar + 3.7" Rigid Centralizer + Nozzle.

Clean and clear rig floor area. PJSM. Prepare CT Injector head service loop and lifting sling for injector head. N/U Pump-in Sub and QuickTest Sub (QTS).
Transfer Injector head to rig floor. Connect service loop on injector head. M/U Nozzle BHA into Lubricator secure with C-plate. Connect Injector Head to QTS. Pressure test slip ram and stripper to 500/2500 psi for 10 mins, OK.
Meanwhile spot N2 converter and N2 tanks on cantilever. Rig up N2 treating lines and connect to CTU.

Confirmed TRSV in open position. Open X-Tree swab valve. RIH CT with tubing clearance BHA and tag PX plug with 4klbs at 6800 ftCT. Flag PX plug depth at CT. Check weight at plug depth. PU/SO: 19/ 9 Klbs. - Break circulate and check weight every 1000 ft during RIH

opsReport.sum24Hr: R/U CTU Injector head. Pressure test BOP. Displace CT with 9.1 ppg Brine. Rig up and pressure test cleanup temporary line. M/U and RIH tubing clearance BHA, tag PX plug at 6798 ftCT. Circulate & flush top of PX plug. Spot Hi Vis. POOH CT with tubing clearance BHA to surface. L/D tubing clearance BHA. M/U & RIH FSV Shifting Tool BHA. RIH FSV Shifting Tool to 5650 ftCT.
opsReport.forecast24Hr: Continue RIH FSV Shifting Tool from 5650 ft to 6750 ftCT. Open SSD #5 (K1Z3 Zone). Perform Injectivity Test. POOH & L/D FSV Shifting Tool BHA. M/U & RIH Nozzle BHA. Unload with N2 & flow K1Z3.

activity.comments:
M/U Nozzle tool BHA consist of (from top): 2” CT connector, 2-1/8” DFCV, 2-1/8” Staright Bar, 2-1/8” Power clean Nozzle.
Connect QTS and pressure test to 3500 psi for 10 mins, OK.
Meanwhile: - Pump Gas Lift in 4-1/2"x9-5/8" annulus, recover 80 bbls Brine - R/U temporary flow line. Pressure test to 500/3000 psi, 5/10 mins, OK
RIH CT with Nozzle tool BHA to 4100 ftCT (above GLM #4 depth). while unload well with N2 (350 scf) and gas lift (1 MMscfd) Recover Brine in trip tank.
RIH CT from 4100 ft to 6600 ftCT (above SSD #5) while continue unload well with N2 (500 scf) and gas lift (1 MMScfd) as per program.

Perform injectivity test to verify SSD #5 open
Rate Pressure Total Volume 0.2 bpm 760 psi 5 bbls 0.3 bpm 975 psi 10 bbls
Stop pump & pressure fall off to 170 psi in 5 mins. Bleed off pressure

Take PU/SO Weight: 18 / 8 klbs. Pump coil with 1.1 BPM / 1150 psi. Pull CT from 6750 ft to 6683 ftCT at 10 fpm to open SSD #5 (K1Z3 zone) at 4791 ftMD - observe no clear indication of SSD opened.
Stop pump. RIH CT back to 6750 ftCT. Pull CT from 6750 ft to 6683 ftCT at 5 fpm in attempt to enggage FSV shifting tool to SSD #5 - observe no clear indication.
Continue RIH FSV Shifting Tool from 5650 to 6750 fCT (30 ft above PX plug) Take PU/SO weight and break circulation with 1 bpm every 1000 ft.
POOH CTU with FSV Shifting Tool from 6683 to surface. B/O & L/D FSV Shifting tool BHA.

opsReport.sum24Hr: Continue RIH FSV Shifting Tool from 5650 ft to 6750 ftCT. Open SSD #5 (K1Z3 Zone). Perform Injectivity Test. POOH & L/D FSV Shifting Tool BHA. M/U & RIH Nozzle BHA to 4100 ftCT. Unload the well with N2. RIH CT from 4110 ft to 6660 ftCT while unloading the well.
opsReport.forecast24Hr: Continue unload & flow K1Z3 as per program.

activity.comments: Monitor well flow with gas lift (1 - 1.5 MMScfd) as per program.
Continue unload well with N2 (500 scf) and gas lift (1 MMScfd).

Monitor well flow at full opening choke with gas lift (1 MMScfd) as per program.
18:30 hrs Shut in well. Pressuret test flowline spool against DBB valve to 5000 psi - OK. Open well through permanent flow line.
POOH CT to surface while gradually stop N2 pump and gradually increase gas lift rate to 2.6 MMScfd.

opsReport.sum24Hr: Continue unload K1Z3 as per program. POOH CT to surface while continue unload through gas lift. Monitor well flow at full opening choke.
opsReport.forecast24Hr: Monitor well flow as per program. RIH FSV Shifting Tool BHA to close SSD #5 then open SSD #4.

activity.comments: RIH FSV shifting tool BHA 6680 ftMD ( 15 ft above SSD #5) Take PU/SO weight and break circulation with 1 bpm every 1000 ft.

Continue monitor well with gas lift (1.5 MMScfd) as per program. - Observe no wellhead growth
Meanwhile: L/D Nozzle BHA and M/U FSV Shifting BHA. Connect injector head.
BHA: 2.1" Dimple connector (2" coil) + 2.38" Motorhead Assembly + 2.12 Ball Circulating Sub + 3.5" Centralizer + 2.125 Hammer Acceleartor + 2.125" Single Acting Jar + 2.2" FSV Shifting Tool + 3.5" Centralizer + 2.125" Nozzle.
Pressure test QTS to 300/2500 psi for 5/5 minutes - good test.
Shut in well. Close manual master valve. Flush temporary line with freshwater. R/D temporary line. Open manual master valva and swab valve.

opsReport.sum24Hr: Continue monitor well flow (K1Z3 zone) as per program. R/D temporary line. RIH FSV shifting tool to 6680 ftCT.
opsReport.forecast24Hr: Close SSD #5 and Open SSD #4. POOH FSV shifting tool BHA. Acidize K1Z2 interval.

activity.comments: Perform injectivity test #2: 0.43 bpm, 2515 psi, 2.58 bbls (observe formation break at 2750 psi) 0.6 bpm, 2755 psi, 2.9 bbls 0.82 bpm, 2840 psi, 4.11 bbls 1.01 bpm, 2880 psi, 5.09 bbls 1.22 bpm, 2910 psi, 3.8 bbls
POOH CT with FSV Shifting Tool BHA. Disconnect injector head and L/D FSV shifting tool. Meanwhile mixing ~105 bbls of 15% HCL Acid and solvent.

M/U Nozzle BHA. Connect injector head and pressure test QTS to 300/2500 psi for 5/5 minutes - good test.. RIH Nozzle BHA to 6650 ftCT.
BHA: 2.1" Dimple connector (2" coil) + 2.125" DFCV + 2.125 Straight Bar + 2.125" Powerclean Nozzle.

Pull CT to 6620 ftCT. Pump 1.1 bpm, 2550 psi while pulling CT from 6620 ft to 6530 ftCT, observe no clear indication of SSD #4 open (no weight flick).
Stop pump and RBIH to 6620 ftCT. Pump 1.2 bpm, 3350 psi while pulling CT to 6530 ftCT, observe same no indication (no weight flick).

Transfer 100 bbls 9.1 ppg of brine to batch mixer. Check CT PU/SOW: 20/7 klbs. RIH CT with 0.7 bpm, 1850 psi. Observe SOW drop from 7 to 5 klbs at depth 6690 ftCT - good indication FSV shfting tool enggage to SSD #5. Continue RIH CT to 6750 ftCT.
Stop pump and let FSV latch dogs to retract. Pull CT pass through SSD #5 to 6670 ftCT with no restriction.
RBIH CT to 6750 ftC with 0.7 bpm, 2000 psi to verify SSD #5 closed, CT pass through with no restriction.
Pull back CT to 6650 ftCT. Fill tubing from Cross-Tee with 90 bbls of 9.1 ppg brine (CT volume: 35 bbls), 0.5-1 bpm, 500-1100 psi. Pressure up tubing to 550 psi, monitor holding for 5 mins, confirmed SSD #5 in closed position.

Perform injectivity test #1: 0.2 bpm, 2000 psi, 2.3 bbls, pump off, observe drop to 1332 psi in 5 mins 0.3 bpm, 2100 psi, 1.5 bbls, pump off, observe drop to 1400 psi in 5 mins 0.4 bpm, 2090 psi, 1.4 bbls, pump off, observe drop to 1324 psi in 5 mins 0.5 bpm, 2050 psi, 1.6 bbls, pump off, observe drop to 1307 psi in 5 mins 0.2 bpm, 2500 psi, 1.8 bbls, pump off, observe drop to 1585 psi in 5 mins

opsReport.sum24Hr: Close SSD #5. Open SSD #4. Perform Injectivity test (2 times). POOH FSV shifting tool BHA. L/D FSV Shifting tool and M/U Nozzle BHA. RIH Nozzle BHA to 6578 ftCT.
opsReport.forecast24Hr: Perform injectivity test. Acidize K1Z2 interval as per program. Unload acid and flowback K1Z2.

activity.comments: Clean and clear rig floor for RIH TCP guns; prepare TCP guns handling equipment.

PJSM. MU TCP guns assembly Run #1: 4-1/2" TCP guns 5 spf (6755-6770 ftMD interval), Spacer, 4-1/2" TCP guns 5 spf (6570-6610 ftMD), Safety Spacer, Dual Hydraulic firing head, 1jt 2-7/8" tubing, POUV valve, 1jt 2-7/8" tubing, X-Overs, 1std 4" DP, RA Piptag (Installed in DP thread). RIH TCP guns run#1 on 4" DP to 1340 ftMD
- Strap top shot to RA piptag marker (187 ft) while RIH. - Fill up string with 9.1 ppg KCl brine every five stands.
Change out BX elevator from 4" to 5.5". Continue RIH TCP guns Run #1 on 5-1/2" DP from 1340 ft to 3240 ftMD. - Fill up string with 9.1 ppg KCl brine every five stands.
L/D CBL-USIT-Tractor. R/D Schlumberger wireline sheaves.
Dress and function test CBL-USIT-Tractor for logging inside 9-5/8" casing.

RIH 7" CBL-USIT-Tractor. Observe tool stop at depth 5750 ftMD. Activate tractor and continue RIH CBL-USIT on tractor to 6800 ftMD.
Retract tractor. Log up CBL-USIT from 6800 ft to 5300 ft MD.
POOH 7" CBL-USIT-Tractor to surface.

PJSM. Clean and clear rig floor. Change out BX elevator to 3-1/2" manual elevator. RU Eline sheaves.
M/U Eline 7" CBL-USIT and Tractor. Function test tractor and CBL-USIT tools - OK.
RIH 9-5/8" CBL-USIT-Tractor to 5550 ft MD. Log up from 5550 ft MD to 3100 ft MD and continue POOH CBL USIT to surface.

opsReport.sum24Hr: Run E-line logging CBL-USIT-Tractor in 7" and 9-5/8" casing. R/D Eline equipment. MU and RIH 4-1/2" TCP gun run #1 to 3240 ftMD.
opsReport.forecast24Hr: Continue RIH 4-1/2" TCP gun run #1 from 3240 ft to 6770 ftMD. R/U Eline Equipment. RIH Eline GR-CCL for depth correlation. Spaceout TCP gun on depth. Perforate and POOH TCP guns.

activity.comments:
Unload well (K1Z2 lower zone) with N2 (350 scf) and gas lift (1 MMScfd). Monitor well flow through EWS well test equipment as per program.
14:00hrs RIH CT nozzle BHA from 4000 ft to 6478 ftCT.
POOH CT Nozzle BHA to surface while unloading well with gas lift (1-1.5 MMScfd). Close X-tree swab valve. Monitor well flow through EWS well test equipment as per program.
Divert flow to permanent production facility and monitor well through MPFM as per program.
Pressure test Elnusa well testing line: - Upstream line to 300/2000 psi for 5/10 mins, OK - Downstream line to 500 psi for 10 mins, OK

Perform Acid Stimulation using CPS pump:
- Open flow line choke valve. 10 bbls of Pre-Flush solvent at 0.5 bpm. - 105 bbls of 15% HCl Acid at 0.5 bpm. Close flow line choke after 35 bbls of acid pumped. Initial WHP 2000 psi and observe WHP increase to 2450 psi, PDHG 4800 psi. Adjust pumping rate to 0.2 bpm and monitor PDHG below 4800 psi. WHP slowly drop to 890 psi, PDHG 2900 psi after ~ 7 bbls acid enter to formation. Maintain pumping rate at 0.5 bpm and WHP continue drop to 40 psi. - Pump 50 bbls of solvent followed by 40 bbls Brine + 10 bbls Soda Ash
Position CT nozzle in front of SSD #4 at 6578 ftCT. Close flowline choke valve and perform injectivity test #3 - through coil: 0.5 bpm, WHP 2000 psi, PDHG 4250 psi, 5 bbls (limit PDHG max 4800 psi)
PJSM. Disconnect N2 line and connect acid line to CT only. Pressure test same to 4000 psi for 10 minutes. Fill up coil tubing with 28 bbls of 9.1 ppg brine.
POOH CT with nozzle BHA to 4000 ftCT.

opsReport.sum24Hr: Perform injectivity test. Acidize K1Z2 Lower zone as per program. Unload & flow well with N2 & gas lift as per program.
opsReport.forecast24Hr: Continue unload & flow well K1Z2 Lower zone as per program. MU & RIH FSV Shifting Tool. Close SSD #4 (Lower K1Z2 zone) and Open SSD #3 (Upper K1Z2 zone).

activity.comments: POOH CT to 4000 ft while cool down N2 pump. Open well and commence unload K1Z2 upper zone with N2 (350 scfm) and gas lift (0.5-1 MMScfd) as per program. Monitor unloading and well flow through EWS well test.
POOH CT to surface while unload K1Z2 upper zone with gas lift (1.5 MMScfd).
Continue unload and flow K1Z2 upper zone with gas lift (1-1.5 MMScfd) as per program. - Bean up well gradually to full open choke. - Pump sodah ash on fly as required.
PJSM. Pressure test line to 4000 psi for 5 min, OK. Fill up CT with filtered SW and close choke after return. Perform injectivity test via CT at 1.2 bpm, WHP 2420 psi, Total vol: 17 bbls.

M/U Nozzle BHA. Connect injector head and pressure test stripper and DFC 2500 psi for 10 minutes - good test. RIH Nozzle BHA to 5774 ftCT.
BHA: 2.1" Dimple connector (2" coil) + 2.125" DFCV + 2.125 Straight Bar + 2.125" Powerclean Nozzle.

Perform Acid Stimulation using CPS pump: - Open flow line choke valve. Pump10 bbls Solvent at 0.5 bpm - Pump 15% HCl Acid at 1.2 bpm, observed WHP drop from 2485 psi to 1665 psi after 8 bbls Acid entering formation. Increase rate gradually to 2 bpm, WHP 1180 psi until total 590 bbls Acid - Pump 50 bbls Solvent, displace CT with 4 bbls filtered SW at 2 bpm

opsReport.sum24Hr: RIH Nozzle BHA to 5774 ftCT. Perform Injectivity test. Perform Acid Stimulation for K1Z2 Upper zone as per program (total acid 590 bbls). POOH CT to 4000 ft. Unload K1Z2 Upper zone as per program. POOH and LD CT Nozzle BHA to surface while unload K1Z2 Upper zone.
opsReport.forecast24Hr: Continue unload & flow well K1Z2 Upper zone. MU and RIH FSV shifting tool. Open SSD #4 (Lower K1Z2 zone) and SSD #5 (K1Z3 zone). Perform multi rate flow as per program.

activity.comments: Switch flow to Production Test Header (MPFM) and continue flow K1Z2 upper zone with gas lift (1 MMScfd) as per program.

Open SSD #4:
Continue Pull CT from 6750 ft to 6520 ftCT while pumping with 1.5 bpm, 1700 psi pass through SSD #4. Observe good indication SSD#4 open at 6597 ftCT (pulling weigth increase from 20 Klbs to 21 Klbs). Stop pump for 5 minutes, retract FSV shifting.
RBIH FSV to 6750 ftCT pass through SSD #4 - observe no restriction. Pull CT from 6750 ft to 6520 ftCT while pumping with 1.6 bpm, 1800 psi pass through SSD #4 - observe no restriction (confirm SSD #4 open). Repeat same for confirmation - OK.

Open SSD #5:
Fill up CT wth filtered SW. Pull CT from 6750 ft to 6680 ftCT while pumping with 1.5 bpm 1330 psi. Observe good indication SSD #5 open at 6714 ftCT (pulling weigth increase from 22 Klbs to 24 Klbs). Stop pump for 5 minutes, retract FSV shifting.
RBIH FSV to 6680 ftCT pass through SSD #5 - observe no restriction. Pull CT from 6680 ft to 6750 ftCT while pumping with 1.5 bpm, 1500 psi pass through SSD #5 - observe no restriction (confirm SSD #5 open).

Continue flow K1Z2 Upper zone with gas lift (1 MMScfd) as per program - Pump soda ash on fly as required.
Meanwhile M/U FSV shifting tool BHA: 2.56" Dimple Conn + 2-3/8" MHA + 3.5" Centralizer + 2-1/8" Intesifier & Jar + 2.2" FSV Shifting Tool + 3.6" Centralizer + 2-1/8" Nozzle
Function test FSV with 0.5 bpm, 65 psi ; 0.7 bpm, 340 psi ; 1 bpm, 1150 psi, OK. Function test Hammer: active at 1 bpm, 325 psi
Open swab valve. RIH FSV shifting tool BHA. Tag PX plug at 6804 ftCT.

opsReport.sum24Hr: Continue unload & flow K1Z2 Upper zone as per program (offline: M/U FSV shifting tool). RIH shifting tool BHA and open SSD #4 (K1Z2 lower zone) and SSD #5 (K1Z3 zone).
opsReport.forecast24Hr: POOH CT and L/D FSV Shifting tool. M/U and RIH prong pulling tool. POOH and L/D prong pulling tool. M/U and RIH PX plug pulling tool. POOH and L/D PX pulling tool. M/U and RIH Nozzle BHA.

activity.comments:
M/U PX Prong Overshot BHA: 2.56" CT connector, 2.375" MHA, 3.5" Centralizer, 2.125" Slinger, 2.125" Dual Acting Jar, 2" HDD, 2" X-over, 3.56" Centralizer, 3.25" Overshot (w/ 2.313" Grapple).
Function test BHA with 0.5 bpm, 660 psi (release indication) Connect CTS & pressure test to 2500 psi, OK.

RIH CT with GS pulling tool BHA. Latch GS pulling tool to PX plug 5 klbs at 6810 ftCT. Wait for 5 mins, pull PX plug with 2 klbs overpull. Run back CT, tag with 5 klbs. Wait for 5 mins, pull PX plug with 4 klbs overpull. (PUW: 21 to 25 klbs).
POOH CT to 1500 ftCT.

M/U PX Plug pulling tool BHA: 2.56" CT connector, 2.375" MHA, 3.5" Centralizer, 2.125" Slinger, 2.125" Dual Acting Jar, 2" HDD, 2" X-over, 3.56" Centralizer, 3.625" GS pulling tool.
Function test BHA with 0.5 bpm, 1500 psi (GS release active) Connect CTS & pressure test to 2500 psi, OK.
POOH CT with FSV shifting tool. Disconnect QTS, B/O & L/D FSV shifting tool BHA.

RIH CT with Overshot BHA and tag with 4 klbs at 6804.5 ftCT. Wait for 5 mins, pull CT and retrieve PX Prong with 2 klbs overpull. POOH CT to surface. Disconnect QTS, recover PX Prong, B/O & L/D Overshot.

opsReport.sum24Hr: POOH CT and L/D FSV Shifting tool. M/U and RIH PX Prong Overshot BHA. Retrieve & POOH CT. Recover PX Prong & L/D Overshot. M/U and RIH PX plug pulling tool BHA. Retrieve & POOH PX plug to 1500 ftCT.
opsReport.forecast24Hr: Continue POOH PX plug from 1500 ftCT to surface. Recover PX plug & L/D PX plug pulling tool. Cut 66 ft CT & M/U new connection meanwhile flow well as per program. M/U & RIH Nozzle BHA to TD (TBC).

activity.comments:
R/D and backload CTU, Acid & Well Test equipment - in progress - Backload CPS pump to boat - L/D nozzle BHA and R/D CT injector head - R/D CT injector head and set back on jacking frame - N/D CT riser and BOP - Flush well test equipment with filtered sea water. R/D well test equipment and lines
Meanwhile divert flow to production MPFM.
POOH CT from 1500 ftCT to surface. Disconnect QTS, recover PX plug, B/O & L/D GS pulling tool.

Continue flow and monitor well (K1Z2 & K1Z3 zones) through Elnusa separator as per program.
Meanwhile: - R/D 4” low pressure hoses between tanks, batch mixer and CPS pump - Backload N2 tank, acid tank, batch mixer, power pack to boat - R/D high pressure treating iron on main deck and stand pipe - Blow dry CT reel - Backload chemicals to boat

Open well through Elnusa separator and monitor well (K1Z2 & K1Z3 zones) as per program - in progress.
Meanwhile: - Cut 66.5 ft of CT. M/U new CT connection. Pressure test to 5000 psi, 10 mins, OK. Pull test 32 Klbs, OK - M/U slim BHA: 2" Dimple connector (2" coil) + 2" X/O + 1.69" MHA + 1.69 Straight Bar + 1.69" Nozzle

opsReport.sum24Hr: Continue POOH PX plug from 1500 ftCT to surface. Recover PX plug & L/D PX plug pulling tool. Flow well (K1Z2 & K1Z3) through Elnusa separator as per program. R/D and backload acid stimulation equipment.
opsReport.forecast24Hr: R/D and backload CTU, Acid & Well Test equipment. L/D tubular from derrick.

activity.comments:
PJSM. L/D tubular from derrick.
Meanwhile backload CTU & Well Test equipment to boat: - CT injector head, CT real, power stand and N2 treating lines - Separator, sand filter and pipe & adapters

Continue R/D and backload CTU, Acid & Well Test equipment: - R/D CT injector head service loop. Disconnect striper. Dismantled hyd hose - R/D N2 treating lines & N2 converter. Backload 4ea N2 tanks & converter to boat - R/D CTU cabin and power pack. Backload to boat - R/D CT reel & position into lifting cradle. R/D CT Power Stand - R/D 3" Elnusa chicksan & adapters in platform and transfer to rig for backload - R/D 3” Elnusa stand pipe from cantilever to Texas deck
Clear cantilever for lay out tubular from derrick.
PJSM. Transverse skid rig floor to the center of cantilever. Prepare for L/D tubular from derrick.

opsReport.sum24Hr: R/D and backload CTU, Acid & Well Test equipment. L/D tubular from derrick.
opsReport.forecast24Hr: Continue L/D tubular from derrick. Offload/backload equipment and material to/from rig.

activity.comments:
Continue L/D tubular from derrick. - Total 3 jts 8-1/4" DC, 18 jts 5-1/2" HWDP, 210 jts 5-1/2" HWDP - Experienced many connections overtorqued
Change out 5-1/2" to 4" handling equipment and L/D 4" HWDP in progress.
Meanwhile: - Install test mandrell and prepare for BOP test on stump (torque up bonnet bolts after inspection & R/U high pressure lines) - Prepare wire anchor - Maintenance on BB Hoist, found air motor need to be replaced - Clean all mud pits - Maintenance on Mud Pump, BOP Accumulator, Jacking Motor & rig floor HPU - Offload 36" conductor from AHTS Canopus

opsReport.sum24Hr: Continue L/D tubular from derrick.
opsReport.forecast24Hr: Continue L/D tubular from derrick. Prepare for rig move: offload equipment and material from boat, arrange same on the rig.

activity.comments:
PJSM. Skid in cantilever 20 ft. Disconnect mud hoses and secure on cantilever. Continue skid in cantilever 10 ft. Hook up 16 ton slings onto Texas deck and dismantle Texas deck stairway.
Meanwhile welder make 2 holes for lifting point and bevel the edge on 30x36" Swage (preparation for SID-3ST).
Continue L/D 27 jts 4" HWDP & 51 jts 4" DP. Meanwhile offload 36" conductor & COSL material from AHTS Canopus.

Prepare for rig move - in progress. - Bundle & arrange DP, HWDP & DC on main deck - Continue offload 36' conductor, drive shoe, X/Over. Lay out same on cantilever - Offload COSL material for rig move: 2ea anchor, buoy, slings - Arrange material on cantilever and main deck for deck management - R/D dumping line and secure same on deck - R/D jumper hoses for DW & SW to rig floor - Dismantle scaffolding bridge from rig to WHP-D & transfer scaffolding material to rig - R/D access stair from main deck to cantilever - Check and maintenance on Legs Jacking gear box.

opsReport.sum24Hr: Continue L/D tubular from derrick. Prepare for rig move (offload equipment and material from boat, arrange material for deck management). Skid in cantilever in progress.
opsReport.forecast24Hr: Continue skid in cantilever. Preparation for rig move. Sea fastening. Jack down to air gap. Connect boat to tow & assist bridle. Jack down. Water tight integrity.

activity.comments: Continue prepare for rig move : - Sea fastening all equipments on main deck, cantilever, rig floor, sack room, shaker house, pit room, pump room and heavy tool store. - Continue PMS, general rig maintenance and preparation for connecting boats. - Housekeeping all areas.
Continue skid in cantilever 20 ft. Retrieve and secure Texas deck. Skid in cantilever 25 ft for final towing position.
PJSM. Jack down hull to 10 m air gap.

Prepare for rig move: - Sea fastening all equipments on main deck, cantilever, rig floor, sack room, shaker house, pit room, pump room and heavy tool store - Prepare and disconnect deep well pumps on starboard & port legs - Jacking up/down test for all legs, OK - Perform BOP test on stump
14:00-15:00 Rig Mover & MWD conduct rig inspection 15:00-16:00 Conduct pre-move meeting on the rig

opsReport.sum24Hr: Continue skid in cantilever. Preparation for rig move (sea fastening, disconnect starboard & port deep well pump, jacking test). Jack down to 10 m air gap. Continue preparation for rig move.
opsReport.forecast24Hr: Continue preparation for rig move. Connect main tow boat. Jack down in the water. Water tight integrity.

activity.comments: Continue prepare for rig move : - Sea fastening all equipments on main deck, cantilever, rig floor, sack room, shaker house, pit room, pump room and heavy tool store. - Continue PMS and general rig maintenance. - Housekeeping all areas. - Perform pressure test choke and kill manifold, kelly hose, upper/lower iBOPs, 2 ea TIW valves and grey valve to 5000 psi. - Grease choke & kill manifold and stand pipe. - Service cuttings dump chute assembly bolts. - Change out wire on monkey board air winches. - Install 2" HP Line from stand pipe manifold connections on main deck to rig floor stand pipe to monitor pressure during jetting the legs. - Slip and cut 70 ft drilling line, calibrate blocks.

opsReport.sum24Hr: Continue preparation for rig move.
opsReport.forecast24Hr: Continue preparation for rig move.

activity.comments: Continue prepare for rig move : - Sea fastening all equipments on main deck, cantilever, rig floor, sack room, shaker house, pit room, pump room and heavy tool store. - Continue PMS and general rig maintenance. - Housekeeping all areas. - Function test all anchor winches. - Service monkey board finger latches. - Clean and service trip tank and flow line gate. - Change out 6" butterfly valve on mixing line #1. - Service wilden pumps in shaker house. - Check drilling equipments inventory.

opsReport.sum24Hr: Continue preparation for rig move.
opsReport.forecast24Hr: Continue preparation for rig move.

activity.comments:
Continue prepare for rig move : - Check & prepare equipment/tools for rig move (anchors, buoy, slings, shackles), good - Continue PMS and general rig maintenance - Housekeeping all areas - Sea fastening checks - Line up mud pumps to jetting lines all legs - Continue service monkey board finger latches - Grease and function diverter valves, flow line valve and trip tank fill up valve - chipping, buffing & painting main deck area
19:00-20:00 Hold Pre-move meeting with JKT team (SAKA & CBS)

opsReport.sum24Hr: Continue preparation for rig move.
opsReport.forecast24Hr: Continue preparation for rig move.

activity.comments: Continue prepare for rig move : - Check & prepare equipment/tools for rig move - Continue PMS and general rig maintenance - Housekeeping all areas - Continue service monkey board finger latches - Clean and grease 17-1/2" Diverter insert - Continue service drilling equipments - Clean and service TDS & BOP - Chipping, buffing & painting main deck area

opsReport.sum24Hr: Continue preparation for rig move.
opsReport.forecast24Hr: Continue preparation for rig move. Connect main & assist tow boat. Jack down in the water. Water tight integrity. Jet & pull legs.

activity.comments: Commence open SSD #3: Pull CT from 5822 ft to 5762 ftC while pumping CT with 1.17 bpm, 2700 psi to activate FSV shifting tool. Observe PUW increase from 17 to 20 klbs at 5791 ftCT depth - good indication of SSD #3 opened. Stop pump, let FSV latch dog retract. RBIH CT to 5822 ftCT - FSV passing SSD #3 with no restriction. Pull CT FSV pass through SSD #3 while pump CT with 1.17 bpm, 2870 psi, observe no restriction (confirm SSD #3 in open position)

Perform injectivity test:
Rate Press Cumm. Vol 0.3 bpm 2150 psi 10.1 bbls 0.35 bpm 2250 psi 12.3 bbls 0.4 bpm 2352 psi 14.8 bbls 0.45 bpm 2375 psi 17.3 bbls 0.5 bpm 2400 psi 19.8 bbls 0.7 bpm 2423 psi 22.8 bbls 1 bpm 2430 psi 25.8 bbls 1.2 bpm 2426 psi 28.8 bbls
Stop pump, pressure fall off from 2420 psi to 1400 psi in 5 minutes.
POOH CT with FSV shiting tool to surface. Meanwhile prepare mixing acid as per program.
Open swab valve. RIH CT with FSV shifting tool BHA to tag PX plug at 6788 ft. - Check CT weight every 1000 ft during RIH

M/U FSV shifting tool BHA and function test same with 0.7-1 bpm, 470-1420 psi, OK.
Meanwhile shut in well at Elnusa choke manifold.

Divert flow to EWS well test and monitor well flow as per program.
Note: Pump on the fly10 bbls soda ash as required

Pull CT to 6530 ftCT. Commence close SSD #4: - Attempt #1, RIH from 6530 ft to 6626 ftCT while pumping 1 bpm, no clear indication. Pull CT to 6566 ftCT - Attempt #2, RIH from 6566 ft to 6626 ftCT while pumping 1.1 bpm, same no clean indication
Fill up tubing with 75 bbls then pressure up tubing to 945 psi, for 10 mins, holding (confirm SSD #4 has been closed).

opsReport.sum24Hr: Continue unload & flow well K1Z2 Lower zone as per program. M/U & RIH FSV Shifting Tool BHA. Close SSD #4 (Lower K1Z2 zone). Open SSD #3 (Upper K1Z2 zone). Injectivity Test. POOH and L/D FSV to surface.
opsReport.forecast24Hr: RIH Nozzle BHA. Acid job for K1Z2 Upper zone as per program. Unload and flow K1Z2 Upper zone as pe program.

activity.comments: Perform final water tight integrity.
Connect high pressure jetting hose on all legs.
Jack down hull to floating draft 17.5 ft on Port, 17.5 ft on Stbd & 19 ft on Bow.
Jack down hull to 10 ft draft.

Continue prepare for rig move.
OFFLINE: Perform pre-water tight integrity. Found leaking on Tank #33 after completed 2 rounds of water tight integrity check. Meanwhile AHTS Carina arrive on SD-01 location at 19:15 hrs. Offload cargo from AHTS Carina.
Continue prepare to rig move. Meanwhile, commence jack down hull to 8 ft draft.

Continue prepare for rig move : - Check & prepare equipment/tools for rig move - Continue PMS and general rig maintenance - Housekeeping all areas - Connect lead towing AHTS Canopus to main towing bridle at 13:30 hrs. - Disconnect bow leg deep well extension joint - Perform jacking function test

Continue prepare for rig move. Send 2pax Pageo to AHTS Carina. Install DGPS positioning equipment on AHTS Carina. Take 1pax Pageo back to the rig at 21:25 hrs.
OFFLINE: Jack up hull to 3 ft air gap. Troubleshoot water integrity on Tank #33.

opsReport.sum24Hr: Continue preparation for rig move. Connect lead towing AHTS Canopus. Jack down in the water. Water tight integrity.
opsReport.forecast24Hr: Jet and pull legs free.

activity.comments:
Pump LoVis and Hi Dens and Circulate hole clean 2x BU with 500 gpm, 1100-1150 psi, 10-15 RPM, 7-8 Kft.lbs
Displace hole to 9.1 ppg KCL brine with 500-550 gpm, 1300-1600 psi, 10-15 RPM, 7-9 kft.lbs.
Flush clean surface line and equipment.

Flowcheck for 10 minutes - well static.
POOH 7 x 9-5/8" WBCO BHA on 5-1/2" DP. Collect debris from 9-5/8" filter 2.5 Kg. L/D 9-5/8" WBCO assembly
Continue POOH 7" WBCO BHA on 4" DP. Collect debris from 7" filter 1.7 kg. L/D 7" WBCO assembly.

Scrape 9-5/8" and 7" casing at packer setting depth interval while RIH WBCO BHA from 6253 ft to 6800 ft MD. Parameters: 500 gpm, 1150 gpm, 15 rpm, 7-9 kft-lbs torque. Scrape 9-5/8" casing interval: 5020 - 5120 ft, 5150 - 5250 ft, 5450 - 5512 ft MD. Scrape 7" liner interval: 6250 - 6350 ft, 6650 - 6750 ft, 6740 - 6797 ft MD.
M/U 9-5/8" casing scrapper, 9-5/8" Grabitz magnet, 9-5/8" casing brush, 9-5/8" wellbore filter and RIH to 1327 ft MD.
RIH 7" Scrapper BHA on 10 stands of 4" DP from 40 ft to 1263 ftMD.

PJSM. P/U & M/U 7" WBCO BHA to 317 ftMD. BHA: used 6-1/8” PDC Bit (HDBS GT64D, S/N 13581662, IADC M423, opened nozzles), Bit sub (w/ FV), 7" Ultra-Clean Casing Scraper , 7" Grabitz Casing Magnet, 7" Casing Brush, X/O, 9 jts of 4" HWDP.
RIH 7" x 9-5/8" WBCO BHA from 1327 ft to 6253 ft MD. Record parameters 300 gpm, 450 psi, 15 rpm, 6-8 kft-lbs torque prior to entering TOL at 5557 ft MD. No restriction entering TOL.

Continue POOH 6-1/8" Drilling BHA on elevator from 3156 ft to surface. L/D BHA. - Unload RA Source. Download memory of MicroScope tool. - Bit grading: 2-1-BT-N-X-I-CT-TD. Two broken teetth at nose area.

opsReport.sum24Hr: Continue POOH 6-1/8" RSS/MLWD BHA on elevator from 3156 ft to surface. RIH 7" x 9-5/8" WBCO BHA to 6253 ft MD. Scrape 9-5/8" and 7" casing at packer setting depth area while RIH WBCO BHA from 6253 ft to 6800 ft MD. Circulate hole clean. Displace well from 9.0 ppg DIF WBM to 9.1 ppg KCl brine. POOH 7" x 9-5/8" WBCO BHA.
opsReport.forecast24Hr: Run CBL-USIT-Tractor logging. Run TCP guns #1. RIH Eline GR-CCL depth correlation.

activity.comments: Drill and log 6-1/8" directional hole from 6873 ft to 7062 ftMD/ 4933 ftTVD. - FR: 270-295 gpm, 1650-1850 psi, WOB 5-12 Klbs, RPM 120, 10-12 Kftlbs, - Inst ROP 25-90 fph. Avg ROP 31 fph. - MW 9.0 ppg of RDIF. No loss - Sweep 15 bbls Lo Vis + 15 bbls Hidens pill as required - Backreamed prior to connection. Take survey before connection - BG 2 units. No peak gas - Survey 6958.65 ftMD/ 4925.88 ftTVD, Inc 85.79°, Azm 316.55° Ct - Ct to plan: 1.71', 0.22' Above, 1.7' Right - Lithology 6818-6840 ft : 100% Limestone 6840-6870 ft : 5-10% Claystone, 90-95% Limestone 6870-6890 ft : 100% Limestone

Drill and log 6-1/8" directional hole from 7062 ft to 7577 ftMD/ 4946 ftTVD. - FR: 300 gpm, 1800-1880 psi, WOB 8-13 Klbs, RPM 100-120, 10-12 Kftlbs. - Inst ROP 25-80 fph. Avg ROP 29 fph. - MW 9.0 ppg of RDIF. No loss - Sweep 15 bbls Lo Vis + 15 bbls Hidens pill as required - Backreamed prior to connection. Take survey before connection - BG 2 units. No peak gas - Survey 7439.71 ftMD/ 4944.06 ftTVD, Inc 88.28°, Azm 312.6° Ct - Ct to plan: 16.63', 0.11' Above, 16.63' Left - Lithology 7062-7577 ft : 90-100% Limestone, 0-10% Claystone - Experience high stick slip, frequently pick up string off bottom and adjust parameters for mitigation
Note: When drilling at 7100 - 7140 ft MD, realtime azimuth direction progressively showing hole trajectory walking to the left from 316deg to 313deg Azimuth. LWD density calliper showing OH size 7.4" at 7100 - 7140 ft MD. Downlink PowerDrive accordingly to avoid walking left tendency.

opsReport.sum24Hr: Drill and log 6-1/8" directional hole from 6873 ft to 7577 ftMD/ 4946 ftTVD. Avg ROP 30 ft/hr.
opsReport.forecast24Hr: Drill and log 6-1/8” directional hole to well TD. Circulate hole clean. POOH 6-1/8" BHA. RIH WBCO BHA.

activity.comments: M/U and rack back 5-1/2" DP stands in derrick using PRS. Drift 5-1/2" DP with 3.5" rabbit while pick up.

Instal cantilever wedges. Install flowline extention to shaker. R/U access walkways and access stair to cantilever.
Lay out and strap 5-1/2" DP.
PJSM. Skid rig to SD-1 well center. P/U 5-1/2" DP stand to check well center, OK.

opsReport.sum24Hr: Skid Rig to SD-1 well center. Preparation for spud: M/U and rack back 5-1/2" DP stands
opsReport.forecast24Hr: Continue M/U and rack back 5-1/2" DP stands. Prepare for spud well.

activity.comments: Continue preparation for spud: - Lay out and strap 5.5" HWDP on cantilever in preparation for M/U stands. - Perform services and drop object inspection after M/U 5.5" DP stands on PRS and TDS (including the dolly track) - Sounding check mud and cement silos.

Continue M/U and rack back 5-1/2" DP stands in derrick using PRS. Drift 5-1/2" DP with 3.5" rabbit while pick up. Total 63 stands.
Offline: - PM Iron Roughneck & Conveyor cat walk electrical control system - Pressure test jumper hose & Gray valve to 300/5000 psi for 5/10 mins - Install diverter rotary lock down latch. - Flush MP flush liner - Housekeeping, chipping & painting on main deck - Housekeeping the shack rooms for incoming mud/cement chemicals

opsReport.sum24Hr: Continue M/U and rack back 5-1/2" DP stands in derrick using PRS. Perform PM on TDS, Iron Roughneck, Conveyor catwalk and PRS.
opsReport.forecast24Hr: Continue preparation for spud: Function test diverter. M/U 5.5" HWDP. Offload 20" casing. PM on shale shakers and mud pumps.

activity.comments: Continue preparation for spud: - PM on TDS: change hydraulic pressure switch, PM on HPU - PM on Conveyor catwalk: replace hinges of conveyor belt - Grease air hoist and rig tongs sheaves on rig floor - Offload and tally 30 joints of 20" casing from AHTS Ruby

M/U and rack back 6 stands of 5-1/2" HWDP stands in derrick. Drift 5-1/2" HWDP with 3.5" rabbit while pick up. - Continue PM on shale shaker seals - Run test trip tank motors. Clean trip tanks - Function check all PVT sensor with pit to pit transfers.

Continue preparation for spud: - Lay out and strap 6 joints of 8-1/4" DC - Transfer 49 MT of G Cement from AHTS Ruby - Offload 18-3/4" BOP HP riser - Perform shaker screen inventory check - General housekeeping

Continue preparation for spud: - Grease and lubricate diverter overboard valves - Install 10" diverter insert and function test same - Install 6" annulus flooding lines - PM on shale shakers: remove screen, visual check all lines for no leaks, visual check all mounting springs, OK - Offload spares bulk transfer hoses - Arrange main deck for 20" casing from AHTS Ruby
Continue preparation for spud: perform drop object inspection for derrick and 3rd party equipment, good. Grease crown & sheaves. Meanwhile lay out and tally 20 joints of 5-1/2" HWDP

opsReport.sum24Hr: Continue preparation for spud: PM on TDS, conveyor catwalk, shale shakers, trip tanks. Function test diverter system. Perform drop object inspection on derrick. Offload 20" casing. M/U & rack back 5-1/2" HWDP.
opsReport.forecast24Hr: Continue preparation for spud.

activity.comments: Continue prepare for spud: - Spot 3x cutting box in front of centrifuges. - Clean and grease shaker screen slots. - Change out flowline ditch gaskets - Change out SOBM transfer hose. - Lubricate mud gun lines and function - Chip and buff trip tank manifold.
Slip & cut 78 ft drilling line and callibarate the drawwork.

Continue prepare for spud: - PM on Knuckle boom crane - Check & replace degasser motor #2 - Check & clean base oil tank & lines - Transfer 950 bbls of Brine from AHTS Ruby to rig - Fit check cement stinger into 20" stab-in casing shoe, OK - Continue PM on HPU on the rig floor - Service supercharge mud pump #1 and function test mud pump - OK. - Service liner wash mud pump #2 and function test same - OK.

Continue prepare for spud: M/U and rack back 8-1/4" DC, Drift DC while pick up with 3.5 " rabbit. - Function test 3 Mud Pumps using sea water, good, service & set pop-off valves - Perform electrical check on degasser pump motor #2 - Clean and inspect 20" casing thread condition - Clean, lubricate and adjust knuckle boom and hook arm

opsReport.sum24Hr: Continue preparation for spud (rack back 8-1/4" DC, function test mud pumps, PM on rig equipment, clean base oil tank). Slip & cut drilling line.
opsReport.forecast24Hr: Continue preparation for spud.

activity.comments: Continue preparation for spud: clear & arrange cargo on cantilever and main deck, offload additional 20" casing, PPLI augers, casing head & adapter from AHTS Canopus. Prepare 30" LP riser, diverter mandrel, overshot, casing head, riser & adapter. Prepare drilling X/Over, bit sub & float valve. Meanwhile: - Install trip tank dump line hose - Lower down Port deepwell pump column and reconnect line - Rearrange and housekeep shack room - Secure drilling package skidding clamps beam - Lubricate and function mud agitator at all pits, OK - Function test all, 3ea mixing pumps, circulate pit to pit, OK - Remove slot cover at cellar & mezzanine deck of WHP-D. Install hard barrier - Clean and clear koomey area. - Reinstall and lower down degasser vent line. - Fill up sandtrap with SW and function test degasser pump #2 - Service riser elevator.

opsReport.sum24Hr: Continue preparation for spud: arrange cantilever & main deck, offload cargo from AHTS Canopus, prepare equipment for drilling, meanwhile PM & function test rig equipment.
opsReport.forecast24Hr: Continue preparation for spud.

activity.comments:
Continue preparation for spud: M/U 13-3/8" combination tool and rack back. Offload from vessel: 26" Anadrill BHA, 20" casing handling equipment, FMC equipment, mud chemical & KCL big bag.
Meanwhile: - Check KCL, Barite & Bentonite mix hopper for preparation mixing mud. Flush fan line of Barite and Bentonite - OK. - Prepare transfer hoses for receiving Barite & Cement from boat - Empty mini container of mud chemical, arrange pallets in shack room, backload empty container to boat - Prepare handling gear (DP slips, safety clamp, lifting sub) on rig floor - Prepare space out & Diverter elevation, install lifting clamp on Diverter 24" overshot & 30" extension - Function test Drawwork emergency lowering & brake test, OK - Prepare 2" HP hoses from cementing unit to platform. - Replace flow meter of accumulator unit - in progress. - Run fire hoses to platform cellar deck - Prepare and service Hi-Torque function good in preparation for M/U diverter adaptor. - General housekeeping: clean and clear rig floor, koomey area, pit room, shaker house. - Flush caustic line in shack room - Replace butterfly valves on barite lines. Clean and empty silo #2 in preparation for receving barite.

opsReport.sum24Hr: Continue preparation for spud: offload BHA, casing handling equipment & mud chemicals from boat.
opsReport.forecast24Hr: Continue preparation for spud.

activity.comments:
PJSM. P/U & M/U 26" Drilling BHA.
BHA: 26” Milltooth Bit IADC115 (18 CJ + 3x20, TFA 1.169, S/N 1689861), Mud Motor A962M5640XP (1.5°Bent, w/ 25-3/4" sleeve stab), 17-1/4” IB Stab, 8 1/4" GWD 20, 8 1/4" MWD TeleScope 8.25in Collar (+ GR Sensor), 2 jts of 8 1/4" Non Magnetic Drill Collar, X/over
Scribe BHA: Motor - GWD: 40.36deg, Motor - MWD: 308.88 deg.

P/U 1 std of 5-1/2" HWDP. Perform shallow test MWD and GWD with700 gpm, 380 psi, good test.
Wash down with 100 gpm, 25 psi and tag seabed at 176 ftMD. Observe soft seabed.
Spud SD-1 well at 23:00 hrs.

Prepare BHA: - SLB DD & MWD check, strap and program the tool - Program and function test Gyro tool - Mud Engineer prepare 450 bbls Hi Vis and 10 ppg KCL Kill mud - Exlog prepare mud logging unit & sensors, OK - PPLI prepare augers & cutting handling equipment

Continue preparation for spud: Lay out Jar and mud motor, prepare 26" bit. Transfer cement and barite from AHTS Ruby. Meanwhile: - Service drawwork break cooling heat exchanger - Run test TDS RPM, IBOP, check saver sub, OK - R/U spider basket ready for N/U diverter

Drill 26" hole from 176 ft to 246 ftMD on 5-1/2" HWDP with 1-2 klbs WOB, 650 gpm, 300 psi, 40 rpm (+72 DHRPM), 0.5-2 kft.lbs - Drill with seawater + 3% KCL. Sweep 50 bbls HiVis pills twice per stand - Take survey after connection - Last survey: 203.4 ftMD, 203.4 ftTVD, Inc 0.2°, Azm 172.95° Ct-Ct to plan: 0.4 ft

opsReport.sum24Hr: Continue preparation for spud. Prepare & M/U 26" BHA. Shallow test MWD and GWD. Wash and tag seabed at 176 ftMD. Spud SD-1 well at 23:00 hrs, drill 26" hole from 176 ft to 246 ftMD.
opsReport.forecast24Hr: Drill 26" hole from 246 ft to 435 ftMD. Circulate hole clean. Spot HiVis. POOH and rack back HWDP. M/U DC & Jar, RBIH to 435 ftMD. Continue drill 26" hole from 435 ft to TD.

activity.comments: POOH on elevator from 435 ft to 145 ftMD.
M/U & RIH 8-1/4” DC, 8” Jar, 4x 8-1/4” DC RBIH to 435 ftMD. - No issue re-enter sea bed. No fill on bottom.

Drill 26" hole from 435 ft to 1436 ftMD/1428 ftTVD - Parameter 670-800 gpm, 330-850 psi, 1-15 klbs WOB, 40 RPM (Motor 0.11 rev/gal), 3-8 Kft.lbs. Bit Krev: 126.49 - Drill with seawater + 3% KCL. Sweep 50 bbls HiVis pills twice per stand - Take survey after connection - Kick-off from +/- 620 ftMD, observe soft formation, adjusted drilling parameter (reduce flow rate & increase WOB to achieve steering) - Start from 1118 ftMD (entering Lidah Carbonate), observe difficult to build angle, adjust parameter by reduce fow rate & increase WOB to achieve steering - From 1297 ftMD, observe harder formation (slow ROP w/ higher WOB) - Slide 53%, rotary 47% - Last survey: 1292.40 ftMD, 1286.97 ftTVD, Inc 12.04°, Azm 177.60° Ct-Ct to plan: 4.32 ft (4.19 ft right & 1.05 ft below)
Pump 100 bbls HiVis and circulate hole clean with 650 gpm, 300 psi

Drill 26" hole from 246 ft to 435 ftMD on 5-1/2" HWDP with 2-5 klbs WOB, 650 gpm, 300 psi, 40 rpm (+77 DHRPM), 3-5 Kft.lbs - Drill with seawater + 3% KCL. Sweep 50 bbls HiVis pills twice per stand - Take survey after connection - Last survey: 383.96 ftMD, 383.96 ftTVD, Inc 0.12°, Azm 39.95° Ct-Ct to plan: 0.43 ft

opsReport.sum24Hr: Drill 26" hole from 246 ft to 435 ftMD. Circulate hole clean. Spot HiVis. POOH and rack back HWDP. M/U DC & Jar, RBIH to 435 ftMD. Continue drill 26" hole from 435 ft to 1436 ftMD/1428 ftTVD.
opsReport.forecast24Hr: Drill 26" hole to TD. Pump Hivis & circulate hole clean. Wiper trip to 280 ftMD. RBIH to bottom. Pump Hivis & circulate hole clean. POOH to surface. M/U & RIH 20" casing.

activity.comments: Pump 100 bbls Hivis & circulate hole clean with 1000 gpm, 1350 psi, reciprocate string.
Spot open hole with 915 bbls of 10 ppg 7% KCL Polymer WBM.
POOH & L/D 26" Drilling BHA. - Observe on surface, 17-1/4" IB stabilizer balled up

RBIH on elevator from 273 ft to 1148 ftMD, got held up. Attempt to pass by reciprocate string up/down with slow progress from 1148 ft to 1222 ftMD (correspond to sliding intervals).
Continue with ream down from 1148 ft to bottom at 1500 ftMD with 250-700 gpm, 260-650 psi, 30 RPM, 3-5 kftlbs.

POOH 26" Drilling BHA on elevator from 1500 ft to 1048 ftMD, got 20 klbs overpull at 1048 ftMD (transition zone from Lidah Carbonate to Lidah Clay formation).
Continue with backream from 1048 ft to 273 ftMD (below Mud Line) with 700 gpm, 650 psi, 30 RPM, 3-5 kftlbs.
Pump 2x 100 bbls Hivis & circulate hole clean for total 2 cycles with 1050 gpm, 1400 psi, reciprocate string.

Drill 26" hole from 1470 ft to TD 26" section at 1500 ftMD/1488 ftTVD. - Parameter 800 gpm, 860 psi, 10-15 klbs WOB, 40 RPM (Motor 0.11 rev/gal), 5-8 Kft.lbs. Bit Krev: 259. - Drill with seawater. Sweep 50 bbls KCL HiVis pills twice per stand - Take survey after connection - Slide 55%, rotary 45% - Last survey: 1417.1 ftMD, 1408.2 ftTVD, Inc 15.46°, Azm 177.1° Ct-Ct to plan: 9.4 ft (9 ft right & 2.6 ft below) Projection to TD: 1500 ftMD, 1487.79 ftTVD, Inc 17°, Azm 176°
POOH 26" Drilling BHA on elevator from 1500 ft to 152 ftMD. - Light backream at 1214', 1178', 1015', 953', 885' & 882' with 250 gpm & 30 rpm

Drill 26" hole from 1436 ftMD to 1470 ftMD/1462 ftTVD. - Parameter 800 gpm, 850 psi, 10-15 klbs WOB, 40 RPM (Motor 0.11 rev/gal), 5-8 Kft.lbs. Bit Krev: 238 - Drill with seawater + 3% KCL. Sweep 50 bbls HiVis pills twice per stand - Take survey after connection

At 1470 ftMD, prior to make connection while checking P/U & S/O weight without pump, observe hole taking weight 15 Klbs at 1468 ftMD (2 ft off bottom) & overpull 10 klbs.
Pump 50 bbls Hivis & circulate hole clean with 800-1050 gpm, 830-1450 psi, reciprocate string. After Hivis out of hole, repeat check, observe take weight 15 klbs at 3 ft off bottom & overpull 10 klbs. Pump several 50 bbls Hivis & circulate hole with 1050 gpm, 1450 psi, after Hivis out of open hole, repeat attempts with similar result (take weight & overpull at different depth +/- 1464 to bottom). Wash down to bottom and continue make up connection.

opsReport.sum24Hr: Drill 26" hole to section TD at 1500 ftMD/1488 ftTVD. Pump 2x 100 bbls Hivis & circulate hole clean. POOH to 273 ftMD (backream from 1048 ftMD). RBIH from 273 ft to bottom at 1500 ftMD (ream down from 1148 ftMD). Pump 100 bbls Hivis & circulate hole. Spot open hole with 915 bbls of 10 bbls Kill Mud. POOH 26" Drilling BHA to surface. L/D BHA in progress.
opsReport.forecast24Hr: L/D BHA. Run 20” casing to bottom. Run & set 5-1/2" Stab-in string inside 20" casing. Circulate. Cement job.

activity.comments: PJSM. P/T line to 2000 psi for 10 mins, good.

Perform 20" cementing job : - Pump 100 bbls of 10.5 ppg spacer - Mix & pump 602 bbls of 14.8 ppg of Cement Slurry at 4 bpm/250 psi - Displace cement with 10 bbls Drill Water - Continue displace cement with 19.2 bbls (under displace 4 bbls) of 10 ppg WBM - Check float, holding good
Note : - CIP at 23:05 - 20" casing shoe @ 1493 ftMD
R/D surface line. Unsting cementing stinger, observe no back flow. B/O pumping tee assy. POOH 3 stands to 1214 ftMD.
Install circulating surface line. Circulate with 400 gpm, 100 psi.
P/U pumping tee assy and connect to TDS. Stab in stinger to shoe with 10 Klbs set down. Fill up 20" casing until full, observe no leaking.

Change out casing elevator to DP elevator. Change out long bails to short bails for handling DP.
R/U C-Plate, Bowl and slip on top of 20" casing.

M/U & RIH 20" casing X-56 133# Leopard SD to final depth at 1493 ftMD, no fill on bottom. - Apply API threadlock on first joint above stab-in shoe - Install centralizers as per tally - Fill every joint with 10 ppg of kill mud - M/U torque 23 kftlbs. Lock 4 ea anti-rotation on all conductor connections
Change out elevator and link bails.

P/U 20" stab-in shoe joint and set on rotary table. Perform stab-in test. RIH & set stab stinger into shoe joint. Fill up annulus an observe no leaking. Unsting & POOH stab-in stinger to surface, observe 4 seals still intact. Secure same.
R/U 20" Casing handling equipments. Change out slip bowls.
P/U & RIH cementing stinger inside 20" casing on 2 stds of 5-1/2" HWDP, continue RIH on 5-1/2" DP to 1491 ftMD. - Install 3ea 5-1/2"x20" centralizers on 1st stand of HWDP
Continue L/D BHA. - Observe bit and motor stabilizer partially balled up - L/O MWD & LWD on cantilever and download data - bit grading : 1-1-WT-A-E-I-BU-TD. Total Krev : 259K
M/U stab-in stinger with 1 stand of 5-1/2" HWDP. Rack back same. M/U PUP + pumping sub + TIW + PUP. L/O same

opsReport.sum24Hr: L/D 26" Drilling BHA. Run 20” casing to bottom at 1493 ftMD. Change out casing handling to DP handling equipment. RIH 5-1/2" cementing stinger inside 20" casing to bottom. Stab-in stinger. Circulate B/U. 20" casing Cement job. Unsting stinger and POOH 3 stands.
opsReport.forecast24Hr: Circulate clean DP. POOH & rack back DP. WOC. Final cut 20" casing with cold cutter. N/U 20-3/4" casing head and adapter assy. N/U Riser, Overshot Mandrel & Diverter. Function test Diverter. Install wear bushing.

activity.comments: Function test Diverter, diverter bag closing time 22 second and no leak. Function test annulus flooding system, flow rate 1320 BPH.
M/U wear bushing running tool on 5-1/2" DP stand. RIH & Set wear bushing at 89.2 ftBRT. POOH and L/D running tool.
PJSM. M/U 17-1/2" Drilling BHA in progress.
N/U Bell Nipple, Overshot & Diverter assy.
N/U X/O Adapter 20-3/4”-3K Speedloc (SL) II BTM x 18-3/4”-5K Flange TOP, 18-3/4” Short Riser, 18-3/4” Long Riser and X/O Adapter 18-3/4” Speedloc BTM x 10K studded TOP.
Cut 20" casing at 115 cm from Cellar deck using FMC Cold cutter. Retrieve & L/D 20" casing cut joints. R/D Varco 20" casing handling equipment.

WOC. Surface cement sample hard at 10:00 hrs. Offline activity during WOC: - Prepare & R/U FMC Cold cutter equipment for cut 20" casing - Build scaffolding at Wellhead and Top deck area - Mix 9.5 ppg 7% KCL WBM for 17-1/2" section
Connect to Side Door Elevator (SDE). Retrieve casing slip. Hold 20” casing still in landing position while secured by SDE.
POOH and rack back 5-1/2" DP & HWDP. B/O & L/D cement stinger.
N/U 20-3/4" Casing Head. Pressure test FS seals to 1000 psi for 10 mins, good.
Drop foam ball inside DP string. Circulate 1x string volume to clean out DP string with 375 gpm.

opsReport.sum24Hr: Circulate clean DP. POOH & rack back DP. WOC. Final cut 20" casing with cold cutter. N/U 20-3/4" casing head, adapter and Riser assy. N/U Mandrel and Diverter assy. Function test Diverter & Flooding line. Install wear bushing. M/U 17-1/2" Drilling BHA.
opsReport.forecast24Hr: Continue M/U & RIH 17-1/2" Drilling BHA to bottom. Displace to 9.5 ppg WBM. Drill out shoe and cement to 1500 ftMD. Drill 17-1/2" directional hole.

activity.comments: RIH 17-1/2" Drilling BHA on 5-1/2" DP, wash down last stand with 300 gpm and tag TOC at 1490 ftMD. - Perform MWD shallow test at 1002 ftMD with 700 gpm, 195 psi, good

Drill out cement and 20" casing shoe with 800 gpm, 770 psi, 40 RPM, 5 kftlbs from 1490 ft to 1493 ftMD. Continue clean rat hole from 1493 ft to 1500 ftMD. - Sweep 50 bbls Hi Vis to clean hole - Reciprocate accross 20" casing shoe, no restriction - Drill shoe time 1.4 hrs and rat hole 0.78 hrs

Drill 17-1/2" directional hole from 1500 ft to 2111 ftMD/2064 ftTVD. - WOB: 5-15K lbs, FR: 800-1000 gpm, SPP: 810-1280 psi, surf RPM: 40, TRQ: 5.5-8 Kftlbs. MW: 9.5-.9.7 ppg. ECD: 9.6-10 ppg. Bit Krevs: 120 - ROP ins: 10-200 fph, ROP avg: 38 fph - Sliding: 54%, rotating: 46% - At 2030 ftMD, observed partial loss 90 bph and decreasing to 15 bph after 2 hrs drilled - Experienced slow ROP (5-20 fph) due to dolomitic layer at several depths - Sweep 50 bbls HiVis pill every stand or as required - Backream full stand before connection (observe erratic torque at sliding interval, reduce speed to polish the area). - Take survey after connection - Lithology : 1500 - 1860 ftMD: 90-100% Limestone, 0-10% Claystone 1860 - 2111 ftMD: 90-100% Limestone, 0-5% Claystone - Last survey at 2025.65 ftMD, 1982.16 ftTVD, 18.84° inc, 184.13° azi Ct-Ct: 19.54 ft (3.88 ft below, 19.54 ft right)

Continue M/U & RIH 17-1/2" Drilling BHA to 685 ftMD.
BHA : New 17½” Milltooth Bit SMITH (SB115C, S/N RK8944, TFA 1.169 in2), Mud Motor A962M560XP (1.5° Bent, 17¼” Stabilizer, Non Ported FV), 12-1/8” IB Stabilizer, NMDC, LWD-ARC8, 8¼” MWD-TeleScope8 HF (w/ GR sensor), 8” NMDC, 2 jts 8 ¼” DC, 8” Jar, 3 jts 8 ¼” DC, X/O Sub, 12 jts 5 ½” HWDP
Displace hole with 9.5 ppg 7% KCL WBM with 600 gpm, 470 psi.

opsReport.sum24Hr: Continue M/U & RIH 17-1/2" Drilling BHA and tag TOC at 1490 ftMD. Displace to 9.5 ppg 7% KCL WBM. Drill out cement & shoe. Drill 17-1/2" directional hole from 1500 ft to 2111 ftMD/2064 ftTVD.
opsReport.forecast24Hr: Drill 17-1/2" hole.

activity.comments:
RBIH to bottom at 7900 ftMD.
Tight spot at 6871 ftMD, hole take weight to 20 Klbs, ream down with 200 gpm, 50 rpm to pass obstruction.
Pump 15 bbls lovis and 15 bbls hidens. Circulate hole clean with 300 gpm, 1700 psi, 120 rpm, 9-10 kft-lbs, Displace open hole to 9.1 ppg of filtered KCl brine (50 bbls).

Flow check for 10 mins, well static. POOH 6-1/8" Drilling BHA on elevator from 7900 ft to 7" shoe at 6738 ftMD. Flow check for 10 mins, well static. Continue POOH 6-1/8" Drilling BHA on elevator from 6738 ft to 3156 ftMD.
Pump 15 bbls lovis and 15 bbls hidens. Circulate hole clean with 300 gpm, 1650 psi, 50 rpm, 9-10 kft-lbs
Pump 15 bbls lovis and 15 bbls hidens. Circulate hole clean 4x bottoms up with 300 gpm, 1800 psi, 100 rpm, 11-12 kft-lbs,

Drill and log 6-1/8" directional hole from 7722 ft to well TD at 7900 ftMD/ 4947 ftTVD. - FR: 300 gpm, 1800-1880 psi, WOB 8-13 Klbs, RPM 100-120, 9-11 Kftlbs. - Inst ROP 40-80 fph. Avg ROP 36 fph. - MW 9.0 ppg of RDIF. No loss - Sweep 15 bbls Lo Vis + 15 bbls Hidens pill as required - Backreamed prior to connection. Take survey before connection - BG 2 units. No peak gas - Well trajectoryl at TD 7900 ftMD/ 4947 ftTVD, Inc 90°, Azm 313.5° - Lithology 7722-7900 ft : 90-100% Limestone, 0-10% Claystone - Experience high stick slip, frequently pick up string off bottom and adjust parameters for mitigation

Drill and log 6-1/8" directional hole from 7577 ft to 7722 ftMD/ 4946.61 ftTVD. - FR: 300 gpm, 1800-1880 psi, WOB 8-13 Klbs, RPM 100-120, 9-11 Kftlbs. - Inst ROP 40-80 fph. Avg ROP 25 fph. - MW 9.0 ppg of RDIF. No loss - Sweep 15 bbls Lo Vis + 15 bbls Hidens pill as required - Backreamed prior to connection. Take survey before connection - BG 2 units. No peak gas - Survey 7622.74 ftMD/ 4946.55 ftTVD, Inc 89.97°, Azm 313.05° - Lithology 7577-7719 ft : 90-100% Limestone, 0-10% Claystone - Experience high stick slip, frequently pick up string off bottom and adjust parameters for mitigation

POOH 6-1/8" RSS/MLWD BHA on elevators from 7900 ft to 7" shoe at 6740 ft MD.
Observe 20 klbs overpull at 6993 ft MD. Reaming restriction at 6993 ft MD with 200 gpm, 760 psi, 50 rpm, 12 kft-lbs torque. Check trip pass thru 6993 ft MD with no pumps/rotation and confirm hole clear.

opsReport.sum24Hr: Drill and log 6-1/8" directional hole from 7577 ft to 7900 ftMD/ 4947 ftTVD. Avg ROP 30 ft/hr. Circulate hole clean. Wiper trip to 7" shoe. RBIH to bottom. Circulate hole clean. Displace open hole to 9.1 ppg filtered KCl brine. POOH 6-1/8" Drilling BHA on elevator from 7900 ft to 3156 ftMD.
opsReport.forecast24Hr: POOH 6-1/8" Drilling BHA on elevator from 3156 ft to surface. L/D BHA. M/U & RIH 7"x9-5/8" Scapper BHA. Scrape packer setting depth in 7" & 9-5/8" casing. Displace well to 9.1 ppg of filtered KCl brine. POOH 7"x9-5/8" Scrapper BHA. L/D BHA.

activity.comments: Drill 17-1/2" directional hole from 2111 ft to 2790 ftMD/2724 ftTVD. - WOB: 6-20 Klbs, FR: 1000-1050 gpm, SPP: 1220-1650 psi, RPM: 40, TRQ: 5-9 Kftlbs. MW: 9.3-9.4 ppg. ECD: 9.5-9.7 ppg. Bit Krevs: 315 Dynamic loss rate 15-20 bph decrease to 5-10 bph - ROP ins: 40-200 fph (slow ROP in Dolomitic & Crystalline Limestone 5-20 fph), ROP avg: 32 fph - Sweep 50 bbls HiVis pill every stand or as required - Backream full stand before connection (observe erratic torque at sliding interval and hard stringer, polish erratic torque area) - Sliding: 47%, rotating: 53% - Lithology: 2111 - 2784 ftMD: 90-100% Limestone, 0-10% Claystone - Take survey after connection - Last survey at 2691.4 ftMD, 2626.61 ftTVD, 12.35° inc, 245.03° azi Ct-Ct: 22.36 ft (3.04 ft above, 22.15 ft right)

opsReport.sum24Hr: Drill 17-1/2" directional hole from 2111 ftMD to 2790 ftMD/2724 ftTVD.
opsReport.forecast24Hr: Drill 17-1/2" directional hole.

activity.comments: POOH 17-1/2" mud motor BHA on elevators from 3563 ft MD to surface. L/D BHA. Bit grading : 1 - 1 - WT - A - E - IN - NO - TD
RIH wear bushing running tool. Engange and retrieve wear bushing. B/O running tool.
PJSM. R/U VarcoIndo CRT and casing handling equipments.
Pump 2x 50 bbl hivis pill and 2x bottoms up with 1050 gpm, 1600 psi, 40 rpm, 10 kft-lbs. Spot 200 bbls of 9.5 ppg 9% KCl WBM.

RBIH from 1493 ft MD to bottom at 3563 ft MD. Take 20-25 klbs weight at 3197 ft, 3323 ft, 3347 ft, 3392 ft MD. Ream down and clear restriction with 20-40 RPM, 500 gpm, 550 gpm, 500 psi. RBIH BHA with no pumps and rotation to confirm hole clear after reaming down. Ream down last stand to tag bottom, no fill.
TDS maintenance.

Wiper trip. POOH 17-1/2" Drilling BHA on elevator from 3563 ft to 3440 ftMD. Got overpull 20 Klbs, pump out/backream from 3443 ft to 20" shoe at 1493 ft MD with 1060 gpm, 1500 psi, 40 rpm, 7-10 kftlbs. - Keep annullus full with flooding pump
Pump 2x 50 bbls of Hivis and circulate hole with 1050 gpm, 1240 psi, 40 rpm, 9-10 kftlbs, meanwhile reciprocate string during circulation. Spot 200 bbls of 9.5 ppg 9% KCl WBM.
Pump 50 bbls hivis pill and circulate hole clean with 1050 gpm, 1500 psi.

Drill 17-1/2" directional hole from 3548 ft to section TD at 3563 ftMD/ 3464 ftTVD. - WOB: 10-20 Klbs, FR: 1060 gpm, SPP: 1580-1650 psi, RPM: 40,TRQ: 8-14 Kftlbs. ECD: 8.66 ppg. Bit Krevs: 527 - ROP ins: 40-100 fph, ROP avg: 32 fph - Pump seawater thru string and activate flooding pump to keep annulus full with seawater - Sweep 50 bbls HiVis pill twice per stand or as required - Backream full stand before connection - Sliding: 46%, rotating: 54% - Take survey after connection - Last survey at 3452.9 ftMD, 3357.07 ftTVD, 21.27° inc, 285.24° azi Ct-Ct: 7.05 ft (3.1 ft below, 6.33 ft right) Proj to TD at 3563 ftMD, 3458.5 ftTVD, 24.5° inc, 287.5° azi

opsReport.sum24Hr: Drill 17-1/2" directional hole from 3548 ft MD to section TD at 3563 ft MD/ 3464 ft TVD. Circulate hole clean. Wiper trip to 20" shoe at 1493 ft MD. RBIH to bottom at 3563 ft MD. Circulate hole clean. POOH 17-1/2" mud motor BHA to surface. L/D BHA. Retrieve wear bushing. R/U VarcoIndo CRT and 13-3/8" casing handling equipments.
opsReport.forecast24Hr: Run 13-3/8" casing to bottom. Circulate. Cement job.

activity.comments: P/U 1 stand of 5-1/2" HWDP, M/U FMC Jetting Tool. RIH and jet packoff seal area with seawater 140 gpm. L/D jetting tool.
Run and set 13-3/8" pack off. P/T pack off to 1800 psi for 10 min, OK. Over pull test 10K. Release and POOH running tool.
Prepare to N/D Diverter assy.
R/D VarcoIndo CRT and handling equipments.
Release Casing Hanger RT. B/O & L/D landing joints.
R/D surface cement line from CRT.

Perform 13-3/8" casing cement job as below: - Pump 100 bbl of 10.5 ppg spacer with rig pump. - Drop bottom plug, then re-engaged CRT. - Mix & pump 145 bbls of 15.8 ppg Tail Slurry - Drop Top plug, then re-engage CRT. - Displace with 10 bbls of seawater with cement unit. - Cont displace with rig pump 511 bbls of seawater at 400 gpm (reduce flow rate to 80 gpm for the last 20 bbls displacement). - Bump plug to 650 psi for 5 minutes, good. - CIP @ 18:30. - Keep running annulus flooding to keep hole during cement job.
R/U cement surface line into CRT swivel. Flush & pressure test line to 3000 psi for 5 min, good test.

RIH 13-3/8" casing to 3557 ft MD and land mandrel hanger at 20" casing head. Confirm landing via annulus valve on casing head. Take 20 klbs weight at 3531 ft MD. Wash down 200-300 gpm with seawater to pass thru 3531 ft MD.
PJSM for cementing job while circulate 300 - 480 gpm, 100 - 180 psi.
Note: 13-3/8" Pilot Guide Shoe at 3557 ft MD. 13-3/8" Float Collar at 3476 ft MD.
Equalize pressure to cement unit. Pressure test 13-3/8" casing to 2200 psi for 15 min, good test. Bleed off pressure to 0 psi and check float, floats holding. Total mud return 3.5 bbls.

RIH 13-3/8" Casing, 68 ppf, L80, BTC TXP from 122 ft to 3461 ft MD. - M/U torque with ±30.6K ftlbs and visually check the triangle. - Install Spirolizers as per tally. - Fill up every joint with seawater and confirm full every 5 joints. - Keep running annulus flooding to keep hole full during RIH.

M/U & RIH 13-3/8" Shoe track (Pilot Guide Shoe joint + 1 jt Intermediate joint + FC joint) to 122 ftMD. - Function test float, good. - Threadlock each connections. - Install Spirolizers as per tally. - M/U torque with ±30.6K ftlbs and visually check the triangle. - Keep running annulus flooding to keep hole full during RIH.
M/U 13-3/8" FMC mandrel hanger prepared with 13-3/8", 68 ppf, K55, BTC pup joints.

opsReport.sum24Hr: RIH 13-3/8" casing to 3557 ft MD. Cementing 13-3/8" casing. P/T 13-3/8" casing to 2200 psi. Set FMC 13-3/8" pack-off seal assy.
opsReport.forecast24Hr: N/D Diverter and LP riser. N/U 13-5/8" FMC Unihead, HP Riser and BOP. P/T BOP connection.

activity.comments: M/U wear bushing running tool. Set wear bushing on wellhead at 87.5 ftRKB. POOH running tool & rack back same.
L/D 2 jts 8-1/4" DC and drilling jar ex 17-1/2" BHA.

P/U & M/U 12-1/4" RSS/MLWD BHA to 225 ftMD. BHA : 12.25” PDC bit (HDBS MME65DMH, SN 13552957, IADC M323, 4x18 & 2x20), RSS PDX6 w/ 12-1/8” Stabilizer and 40/32” flow restrictor, LWD ARCVISION, MWD Telescope, LWD SlickADN8, 8-1/4” Pony NMDC, X/O, 4 x 5½” HWDP, 7” Drilling Jar, 10 x 5½” HWDP
- Surface test PowerDriveX6 with 600 gpm/260 psi, OK.
POOH BOP test plug & L/D same. Rack back stand on derrick.
PJSM. Line up to cement unit and flush surface line & kill line. P/T BOP connection 300/4000 psi for 5/5 mins, good test.
M/U and set 13-5/8" BOP test plug.
N/U 24" bell nipple mandrel.
R/U 70 ft 64 Ton BOP slings. Transfer 18-3/4" 15K BOP from the stump and N/U BOP to adaptor 18-3/4" 5K Speedloc bottom x 18-3/4" 15K Flange top. R/D 70 ft 64 Ton BOP slings.
Re-arrange scaffolding board at platform top deck. N/U adaptor 18-3/4" 5K Speedloc bottom x 18-3/4" 15K Flange top.

N/U 13-5/8" FMC 5K Unihead. Pressure test Unihead cavity to 1800 psi for 10 minutes. Top of FMC Unihead at 84.9 ft BRT.
N/U adaptor 13-5/8" 5K Speedloc bottom x 18-3/4" 5K Hub top. N/U HP Riser 18-3/4" 5K Speedloc bottom x 18-3/4" 5K Hub top.
N/U overshot and KFDJ diverter.
N/D X/O Adapter 18-3/4” Speedloc BTM x 10K studded TOP, 18-3/4” Long Riser, 18-3/4” Short Riser and X/O Adapter 20-3/4”-3K Speedloc (SL) II BTM x 18-3/4”-5K Flange TOP .
N/D Diverter assy, Overshot and Mandrel.
Build scaffolding on cellar deck platform.

opsReport.sum24Hr: N/D Diverter and LP riser. N/U 13-5/8" 5K FMC Unihead, HP Riser, Adaptor, 18-3/4" 15K BOP and mandrel bell nipple. N/U overshot and KFDJ diverter. P/T BOP connection to 4000 psi. Set wear bushing. P/U and M/U 12-1/4" RSS/MLWD BHA to 225 ftMD.
opsReport.forecast24Hr: RIH 12-1/4" RSS/MLWD BHA. Displace to 12.0 ppg SOBM. DOC. Drill 10 ft new formation. FIT to 13.4 ppg EMW. Drill 12-1/4" directional hole.

activity.comments: PJSM. Displace well from SW to 12.0 ppg SOBM. Continue to displace choke manifold & MGS from SW to 12.0 ppg SOBM and fill up sand trap.
Troubleshoot leaking pump off valve MP #1 and #3.

Continue drill out plugs, float collar, hard cement and pilot guide shoe from 3475 ft to 3557 ft MD. Clean out rat hole from 3557 ft to 3563 ft MD.
