Parameters: 650-750 gpm, 1050-1475 psi, 15-20 Klbs WOB, 60 RPM, 9-10 Klbsft. MW 12.0 ppg SOBM. Ream up/down and check trip thru float equipment until no restriction.

Drill 12-1/4" directional hole from 3573 ft to 4300 ftMD/ 4061 ftTVD. - Parameters: 900 gpm, 1950 psi, 10-15 Klbs WOB, 80-140 RPM, 10-6 Klbsft. - MW 12.0 ppg SOBM. ECD 12.1-12.42 ppg. - Ream up/down full stand prior connection. - Lithology at 3563-4270 ftMD: 0-60% Limestone, 40-100% Claystone - Take survey after connection - Last survey at 4215.95 ftMD, 3998.95 ftTVD, 41.72° inc, 299.66° azi Ct-Ct: 17.02 ft (16.43 left, 4.44 ft below) - Maintain 10 ppb of LCM (8 ppb Fracseal & 2 ppb CaCO3) concentration in active system as bridging agent
Perform choke drill, good drill.
Circulate hole clean. MW in/out 12.0 ppg. Pump 100 bbls 12.0 ppg SOBM with 8 ppb FracSeal and 2 ppg CaCO3. Sample from 3573 ft MD: 65% claystone, 5% limestone, 30% cement.

Perform FIT 13-3/8" shoe to 13.49 ppg (maximum surface pressure 268 psi) with 12.0 ppg SOBM at 3557 ft MD / 3453 ft TVD. Stabilize pressure 225 psi after 10 minutes pump off. Pump 0.8 bbls. Bleed back 0.8 bbls.
Drill 10 ft new formation from 3563 ft to 3573 ft MD.

RIH 12-1/4" RSS BHA on 5-1/2" DP from 570 ft to tag TOC 10K lbs above plugs at 3467 ftMD (wash down last stand with 375 gpm).
- Shallow test MWD/LWD at 1279 ftMD with 800 gpm/710 psi, OK.
Drill out cement above plugs and top/bottom plug from 3467 ft to 3475 ftMD. Parameters: 600 gpm, 965 psi, 5-7 Klbs WOB, 50 RPM, 6-9 Klbsft.

Continue M/U & RIH 12-1/4" RSS/MLWD BHA from 225 ft to 570 ftMD. BHA : 12.25” PDC bit (HDBS MME65DMH, SN 13552957, IADC M323, 4x18 & 2x20), RSS PDX6 w/ 12-1/8” Stabilizer and 40/32” flow restrictor, LWD ARCVISION, MWD Telescope, LWD SlickADN8, 8-1/4” Pony NMDC, X/O, 4 x 5½” HWDP, 7” Drilling Jar, 10 x 5½” HWDP
- Load RA source into ADN8 tool.

opsReport.sum24Hr: RIH 12-1/4" RSS/MLWD BHA from 225 ft to tag TOC at 3467 ft MD. Choke drill. Displace hole to 12.0 ppg SOBM. Drill out shoe track and clean rat hole from 3467 ft to 3563 ft MD. Drill 10 ft new formation to 3573 ft MD. FIT 13-3/8" shoe to 13.49 ppg. Drill and log 12-1/4" directional hole from 3573 ft to 4300 ftMD/ 4061 ftTVD.
opsReport.forecast24Hr: Continue drill and log 12-1/4" directional hole to TD. Pump tandem Lovis + Hidens pills. Circulate hole clean. Wiper trip. POOH to 13-3/8" shoe. RBIH to bottom.

activity.comments: CBU to check last cutting sample (confirmed by geologist, last sample 70% limestone & 30% claystone). Pump sweeps 25 bbls LoVis + 25 bbls Hidens. Circulate 6x bottom up while reciprocate string with 900 gpm, 120-140 rpm. Observed cuttings reasonably clean on shaker after circulate 6x bottom up. - Hole avg size 12.60" from drop rice lag check

Drill and log 12-1/4" directional hole from 4300 ft to 4785 ftMD/ 4375 ftTVD. - Parameters: 900 gpm, 2120 psi, 10-15 Klbs WOB, 140-160 RPM, 10-6 Klbsft. Avg ROP 80 ft/hr. - MW 12.0 ppg SOBM. ECD 12.35-12.50 ppg. - Ream up/down full stand prior connection. - Lithology at 4270-4700 ftMD: 0-60% Limestone, 40-100% Claystone - Take survey after connection - Last survey at 4692.83 ftMD, 4320.76 ftTVD, 53.27° inc, 306.38° azi Ct-Ct: 8.05 ft (6.72 left, 4.43 ft above) - Maintain 10 ppb of LCM (8 ppb Fracseal & 2 ppb CaCO3) concentration in active system as bridging agent - Pump tandem Lo-vis & Hi-dens pill for 25 bbls for each pills sweep as hole condition dictates

Drill and log 12-1/4" directional hole from 4785 ft to section TD at 5750 ftMD/ 4803 ftTVD. - Parameters: 900 gpm, 2150 psi, 10-15 Klbs WOB, 160 RPM, 6-9 Klbsft. Avg ROP 78 ft/hr. - MW 12.0 ppg SOBM. ECD 12.4-12.5 ppg. - Ream up/down full stand prior connection. - Lithology at 4270-3870 ftMD: 0-60% LST, 40-100% Clayst, 3870-5130 ftMD: 5-10% LST, 40-90% Clayst, 0-10% SST, 5130-5380 ftMD: 5-60% LST, 40-85% Clayst, 0-25% SST, 5380-5750 ftMD: 5-70% LST, 30-95% Clayst - BG 5 units, Max gas 28 units from 5084 ftMD (sandstone) - Last survey at 5688.33 ftMD, 4786.15 ftTVD, 72.82° inc, 311.05° azi Ct-Ct: 4.9 ft (4.9 left, 0.29 ft below) Proj to TD at 5750 ftMD, 4803.5 ftTVD, 74.5° inc, 312.5° azi - Maintain 10 ppb of LCM (8 ppb Fracseal & 2 ppb CaCO3) concentration in active system as bridging agent - Pump tandem Lo-vis & Hi-dens pill for 25 bbls for each pills sweep as hole condition dictates
Flow check for 10 mins, well static. WIper trip. POOH 12-1/4" Drilling BHA on elevator from 5750 ft to 5418 ftMD.

opsReport.sum24Hr: Drill and log 12-1/4" directional hole from 4300 ft MD to section TD at 5750 ft MD. Pump tandem Lovis + Hidens pill. Circulate hole clean 6x bottom up. Flow check. POOH 12-1/4" Drilling BHA from 5750 ft to 5418 ftMD.
opsReport.forecast24Hr: Wiper trip to 13-3/8" shoe. RBIH to bottom. Circulate hole clean. POOH 12-1/4" RSS/MLWD BHA. Retrieve wear bushing. RIH 9-5/8" casing.

activity.comments: R/U VarcoIndo 9-5/8" Volant CRT and casing handling tool.

PJSM. M/U & RIH 9-5/8" shoe track 47 ppf, L80, VT to 129 ftMD. - Penetrator shoe joint + Intermediate joint + Float collar joint - Function tested Penetrator Shoe & Float collar valves, OK. - Threadlocked each connection
RIH 9-5/8" casing, 47 ppf, L80, VT from 129 ft to 2222 ftMD. - M/U torque at 15.9 Kftlbs. - Installed 9-5/8" Spirolizers & Centek as per tally. - F/U string every 10 joints.
Retrieve wear bushing.

Unload RA source. Break out 12-1/4" PDC bit HDBS MME65DMH, S/N 13552957, IADC M323. Dull grading 2-1-LT-C-X-I-LM-TD. Lost one PDC cutter at cone section of the bit. Lost a small amount of matrix body surrounding the lost cutter.
L/D Anadril RSS PDX6 w/ 12-1/8” Stabilizer and 40/32” flow restrictor, LWD ARCVISION, MWD Telescope, LWD SlickADN8 and 8-1/4” Pony NMDC.
POOH 12-1/4" RSS/MLWD BHA on elevators from 5750 ft to 13-3/8" shoe at 3557 ft MD. Hole slick.
Pump 25 bbls Lovis and 25 bbls Hidens pill and circulate hole clean with 2x bottoms up at 900 gpm, 140 rpm, 5 kft-lbs torque. Small amount of cuttings at shakers. Flow check, well static. Pump slug.
RBIH 12-1/4" BHA on elevator from 3542 ft to bottom at 5750 ft MD. Hole slick. No fill at bottom.
Circulate hole clean with 900 gpm, 1890 pi, 40 rpm, 6 Kftlbs while reciprocate string.
Flow check, well static. POOH 12-1/4" RSS/MLWD BHA from 3557 ft to 88 ft MD.
POOH 12-1/4" BHA from 5418 ft to 3542 ftMD (inside 13-3/8" shoe). - Got overpull up to 20 Klbs at 3938 ft, 3854 ft, 3838 ft in Rancak formation, work pipe to pass obstruction.

opsReport.sum24Hr: Wiper trip 12-1/4" RSS/MLWD BHA to 13-3/8" shoe. Circulate hole clean. RBIH to bottom at 5750 ft MD. Circulate hole clean. POOH 12-1/4" RSS/MLWD BHA from 5750 ft to surface. L/D BHA. Retrieve wear bushing. R/U CRT & casing handling equipment. M/U & RIH 9-5/8" shoe track to 170 ftMD. RIH 9-5/8"casing, 47 ppf, L80, VT to 2222 ftMD.
opsReport.forecast24Hr: RIH 9-5/8" casing 47 ppf, L80, VT to bottom. Land casing hanger. Circulate hole prior to cement job. Perform cement job 9-5/8" casing. R/D CRT. Jet wellhead. Install 9-5/8" pack off assy & test same. Set wear bushing. M/U & RIH 8-1/2" Drilling BHA.

activity.comments: M/U & RIH 9-5/8" Pack off assy as per FMC engineer. P/T pack off seal to 3800 psi, 10 min. OK. Overpull test 10K lbs. Release pack off running tool. Pull out and L/D same.
Set wear bushing at 86 ftBRT.
PJSM. M/U 8-1/2" RSS/MLWD BHA in progress.
R/D VarcoIndo CRT assy. Change out link bails to drilling link bails and elevator.
R/D surface lines, meanwhile monitor well on trip tank, well static. Disengage CRT. Release Casing Hanger Landing joint assy. POOH & L/D Landing joints assy to main deck.

PJSM. Perform 9-5/8" casing cementing job. - Pump 10 bbls seawater preflush. Pressure test cementing lines to Volant CRT to 4000 psi. - Rig pump 100 bbls of 12.5 ppg Spacer. - Dis-engage CRT. Drop bottom plug. Stab-in CRT. - Mix and pump 110 bbls of 13.6 ppg Lead Slurry and 77 bbls of 15.8 ppg Tail Slurry - Dis-engage CRT. Drop top plug. Stab-in CRT. - Cement unit displace 10 bbls drill water. - Rig continue displace with 12.0 ppg SOBM at 400 gpm, 150 - 650 psi. Reduce rate to 80 gpm for the last 20 bbls displacement, pressure 330 - 400 psi. - No bump plug. - Stop pump after total displacing string + 1/2 shoe track volume volume (418 bbls or 2733 strokes), pressure 330 psi. - No losses throughout cementing job. Observe SOBM ES drop to 80-90 at the end of displacement. - Bleed off stabilized pressure at 300 psi to zero, bleed back 1.3 bbls, floats holding.
Lead slurry recipe: Yield 1.698 cuft/sx. Total mixing fluid 9.158 gps. Drill water 7.26 gps. Defoamer 0.011 gps, Fluid Loss 1.083, Gas Block 0.735, Retarder 0.048, Anti Setting Agent 0.5% BWOC, Nylon Fiber LCM 0.25% BWOC.
Tail slurry recipe: Yield 1.221 cuft/sx. Total mixing fluid 5.589 gps. Drill water 3.894 gps. Defoamer 0.011 gps, Fluid Loss 0.866, Gas Block 0.653, Retarder 0.064, Expander 3% BWOC.
Lead mixing fluid in tank premix-1 inadvertantly transfered to tank premix-2 contaminating Tail mixing fluid. Preparing Lead and Tail mixing fluid. Continue circulate 400-300 gpm, 300-250 psi.
Circulate condition mud thru CRT at 400 gpm, 350 psi. SOBM 12.0 ppg and YP 21 lb/100 ft².

M/U FMC 9-5/8" mandrel hanger. RIH 9-5/8" casing to 5743 ft MD. Landing FMC mandrel hanger in Unihead. Hole slick.
9-5/8" Penotrator Shoe at 5743 ft MD. 9-5/8" Float Collar at 5657 ft MD.
M/U & RIH FMC Jetting Tool to pack off profile area and jet clean with SW at 100 gpm, 500 psi, 5 rpm. L/D same.

RIH 9-5/8" casing, 47 ppf, L80, VT from 2222 ft to 4768 ftMD. Hole slick. - M/U torque at 15.9 Kftlbs. - Installed 9-5/8" Spirolizers & Centek as per tally. - Break circulate at 3472 ftMD with 200 gpm. - F/U string every 10 joints.

opsReport.sum24Hr: RIH 9-5/8"casing, 47 ppf, L80, VT to 5743 ftMD. Circulate condition mud. Cementing 9-5/8" casing. L/D landing joints and 9-5/8" mandrel hanger R/Tool. R/D CRT. Jet wellhead. Install 9-5/8" pack off assy & test same. Set wear bushing. M/U 8-1/2" RSS/MLWD BHA.
opsReport.forecast24Hr: RIH 8-1/2" RSS/MLWD BHA to tag TOC. Choke drill. P/T 9-5/8" casing to 3300 psi. DOC. Drill 10 ft new formation. Circulate. FIT. Drill 8-1/2" directional hole.

activity.comments: Pressure test 9-5/8" casing to 3300 psi for 10 minutes with 12.0 ppg SOBM. Volume pumped 6.5 bbls. Bled back 6.5 bbls.

Drill out plugs, float equipment, hard cement in the shoetrack from 5647 ft to 5743 ft MD. Parameters: FR 500 gpm, SPP 1750-1500 psi, WOB 5-12 Klbs WOB, 40-70 RPM, Torque 8-11 kft-lbs.
Meanwhile, displace 12.0 ppg SOBM in the hole with 10.0 ppg SOBM in reserve pit.
Clean out rat hole from 5743 ft to 5750 ft MD with minimum WOB.
ream up/down at float equipment interval several passes to ensure no restriction.

Drill and log 8-1/2" directional hole from 5750 ft to 6185 ft MD/ 4904 ft TVD. Avg ROP 36 ft/hr.
Parameters: FR 550-600 gpm, SPP 1650-1950 psi, 10-18 Klbs WOB, 80-140 RPM, Torque 8-12 kft-lbs On Bottom and 5-7 ft lbs Off Bottom. MW 10.0 ppg SOBM. ECD 11.4-11.5 ppg. BG: 2 units, no peak gas Lithology 5750-6185 ft : Limestone 100% Last Survey: 6119.33 ftMD/ 4875.11 ftTVD, Inc 84.02°, Az 313.60° Ct-ct to plan: 7.4 ft (7.23 ft left, 1.56 ft below)
- Maintain MW with running 2ea centrifuges. - Maintain 6 ppb Fracseal in active system as bridging agent. - Ream up/down full stand prior connection. - Take survey before connection. - Pump tandem 20 bbls Lovis & 20 bbls Hidens pill as required. - Experience high stick slip, pick up off bottom frequently for mitigation.

RIH 8-1/2" RSS/MLWD BHA on 5-1/2" DP from 479 ft to 5524 ftMD. Wash down with 500 gpm, 1750 psi to tag TOC at 5647 ft MD (Float Collar at 5657 ft MD).
- Shallow test MWD/LWD at 1119 ftMD with 500 gpm/1275 psi, OK.

M/U & RIH 8-1/2" RSS/MLWD BHA to 479 ftMD. BHA : 8.5” PDC bit (SMITH MSi616LBPX, S/N JV2475, IADC M423, 2x14 & 4x13, TFA 0.819 in²), RSS PowerDriveX6, PD RT Comm SRX, Ecoscope w/ 8-1/4” Stabilizer, MWD Telescope w/ X/O sub, 6-3/4” NMDC, XO Sub, 4 jts x 5 ½” HWDP, 7” Drilling Jar, 7 jts x 5 ½” HWDP
- Surface test RSS PowerDriveX6 with 400 gpm/430 psi, OK.
Choke drill.

opsReport.sum24Hr: RIH 8-1/2" RSS/MLWD BHA and tag top of cement at 5647 ft MD. Choke drill. Pressure test 9-5/8" casing to 3300 psi. Drill out shoe track and clean rat hole from 5647 ft to 5750 ft MD. Drill and log 8-1/2" directional hole from 5750 ft to 6185 ft MD/ 4904 ft TVD.
opsReport.forecast24Hr: Drill and log 8-1/2" directional hole.

activity.comments:
Drill and log 8-1/2" directional hole from 6376 ft to section TD at 6818 ft MD/ 4913 ft TVD. Avg ROP 39 ft/hr. Parameters: FR 600 gpm, SPP 2000 psi, 15-18 Klbs WOB, 120-140 RPM, Torque 8-12 kft-lbs On Bottom and 5-6 ft lbs Off Bottom. MW 10.0 ppg SOBM. ECD 11.4-11.55 ppg. BG: 2 units, no peak gas Lithology 6376-6818 ft : Limestone 100% Last Survey: 6755.04 ftMD/ 4909.42 ftTVD, Inc 84.85°, Az 315.56° Ct-ct to plan: 7.31 ft (1.93 ft left, 7.05 ft below trajectory plan revision 14) Proj to TD: 6818 ftMD/ 4914.99, Inc 85.00°, Az 315.50° At 6655 ft MD, commence reduce hole inclination to 85° as per Subsurface requirement.
- Occationally run 1ea centrifuge to maintain MW. - Maintain 6 ppb Fracseal in active system as bridging agent. - Ream up/down full stand prior connection. - Take survey before connection. - Pump tandem 20 bbls Lovis & 20 bbls Hidens pill as required. - Experience less stick slips. - Observe drilling break at 6765 ft MD, ROP increase from 50 to 100 ft/hr. Drill to 6770 ft MD. Flow check, well static.
Flow check for 10 mins, well static. Wiper trip 8-1/2" Drilling BHA on elevator from 6818 ft to 5714 ftMD (inside 9-5/8" shoe).
Pump sweeps 20 bbls LoVis + 20 bbls Hidens. Circulate hole clean while reciprocate string with 600 gpm, 1920 psi, 40 rpm, 7 Kftlbs

Drill and log 8-1/2" directional hole from 6185 ft to 6376 ft MD/ 4887 ft TVD. Avg ROP 35 ft/hr. Parameters: FR 600 gpm, SPP 1950 psi, 10-18 Klbs WOB, 120-140 RPM, Torque 8-12 kft-lbs On Bottom and 5-6 ft lbs Off Bottom. MW 10.0 ppg SOBM. ECD 11.4-11.55 ppg. BG: 2 units, no peak gas Lithology 6185-6376 ft : Limestone 100% Last Survey: 6218.99 ftMD/ 4883.53 ftTVD, Inc 86.29°, Az 315.15° Ct-ct to plan: 6.55 ft (6.55 ft left, 0.05 ft below)
- Maintain MW with running 2ea centrifuges. - Maintain 6 ppb Fracseal in active system as bridging agent. - Ream up/down full stand prior connection. - Take survey before connection. - Pump tandem 20 bbls Lovis & 20 bbls Hidens pill as required. - Experience high stick slip, pick up off bottom frequently for mitigation.

Pump sweeps 20 bbls LoVis + 20 bbls Hidens. Circulate 4x bottom up while reciprocate string with 600 gpm, 2000 psi, 120 rpm, 6 Kftlbs. Observed cuttings reasonably clean on shaker after circulate 4x bottom up. - Hole avg size 8.60" from drop rice lag check

opsReport.sum24Hr: Drill and log 8-1/2" directional hole from 6185 ft to section TD at 6818 ft MD/4913 ft TVD. Flow check. Wiper trip to 5714 ftMD (inside 9-5/8" shoe). Pump Lovis + Hidens. Circulate hole clean.
opsReport.forecast24Hr: RBIH to bottom. Pump Lovis + Hidens. Circulate hole clean. POOH 8-1/2" RSS/MLWD BHA. RIH 7" liner.

activity.comments: P/U & M/U 7" Liner Hanger + Running tool assy installed with Solo wiper plug. M/U X/O and 1 stand HWDP, broke circulation with 200 gpm, 140 psi. - R/D 7" casing handling equipment. - P/U 122 Klbs, S/O 117 Klbs. - Confirmed shear pins installed as per program.

RIH 7" Liner on 5-1/2" DP from 1212 ft to 5730 ftMD. Break circulation while taking parameter. - Without circulation : 30 RPM, 5-8 Klbsft, P/U 213 Klbs, S/O 188 Klbs - With circulation : 240 gpm, 325 psi, 30 RPM, 5-8 Klbsft, P/U 217 Klbs, SOW 190 Klbs - Filled up string every 10 stands. - Running speed 2 min slip to slip. - Drift all pipe with 2-7/8" rabbit. - No losses.
RIH 7" Liner on 5-1/2" DP from 5730 ft to 6369 ftMD - Filled up string every 10 stands. - Running speed 3 min slip to slip. - Drift all pipe with 2-7/8" rabbit. - No losses.

RIH 7" liner 26ppf, L80, TSH from 92 to 306 ft MD. M/U X/O TSH pin x VamTop box. RIH 7" liner 26ppf, L80, 13Cr, VamTop HC from 306 ft to 1212 ft MD.
Install spirolizer as per tally. Fill up liner every joint. Top fill up every 5 joints.
TSH optimum M/U torque 9,010 ft-lbs. VamTop HC optimum M/U torque 11,950 ft-lbs. VamTop x VamTop HC optimum M/U torque 8720 ft-lbs.

M/U 7" shoe track and RIH to 92 ft MD. Shoe track component: 7" Weatherford reamer shoe, 1 jnt 7" liner BTC, X/O BTC pin x TSH box, 1 jnt 7" liner TSH, X/O TSH pin x NSCC box, 7" Baker Float Collar, 7" Baker Landing Collar, X/O NSCC pin x TSH box.
Function test float holding back pressure and draining mud, good test. Install spirolizer as per tally. Threadlock all shoe track connections.
R/D 5-1/2" DP elevators. R/U VarcoIndo 7" power tongs with torq turn computer, side doors elevators and handling equipment.

Unload RA source. Break out 8-1/2" Smith PDC bit MSi616LBPX, S/N JV 2475, IADC M423. Dull grading 1-1-WT-A-X-I-CT-TD. Minor chipped teeth on one cutter at shoulder section of the bit.
L/D Anadril RSS PDX6 w/ 8-3/8" Stabilized CC and 32/32” flow restrictor, LWD EcoScope, MWD Telescope, 6-3/4” NMDC.
POOH 8-1/2" RSS/MLWD BHA on elevator from 5743 ftMD to 98 ft MD.
Pump sweeps 20 bbls LoVis + 20 bbls Hidens. Circulate hole clean while reciprocate string with 600 gpm, 1920 psi, 40 rpm, 7 Kftlbs. Flow check, well static. Pump slug.
Flow check for 10 mins, well static. POOH 8-1/2" RSS/MLWD BHA on elevator from 6818 ft to 9-5/8" shoe at 5743 ftMD. Hole slick. Check trip pass thru 9-5/8" shoe, hole clear.

PJSM. M/U Baker cementing head assy and L/D to cantilever deck. Top to bottom: 10 ft pup jnt, FOSV, X/O, Baker cementing head, X/O, 15 ft pup jnt.
1.5" phenolic ball and 1ea wiper dart installed in the Baker cementing head. Drift X/O and pup joint with 2.5" rabbit.

RBIH 8-1/2" BHA on elevator from 5714 ft to bottom at 6818 ftMD. No fill at bottom. - Got obstruction 15 Klbs at 5754 ftMD, wash/ream and work pipe on obstruction several times then repass without pump, OK.
TDS maintenance.
Pump sweeps 20 bbls LoVis + 20 bbls Hidens. Circulate 3x bottom up while reciprocate string with 600 gpm, 2000 psi, 120 rpm, 6 Kftlbs.

opsReport.sum24Hr: RBIH 8-1/2" RSS/MLWD BHA on elevators from 9-5/8” shoe at 5743 ft to bottom at 6818 ft MD. Circulate hole clean. POOH 8-1/2" RSS/MLWD BHA on elevators to 9-5/8" shoe at 5743 ft MD. Circulate hole clean. POOH 8-1/2" RSS/MLWD BHA from 5743 ft to surface. Pre-M/U Baker cementing head. RIH 7" liner to 1212 ft MD. M/U Liner Hanger. RIH 7" liner on 5-1/2 DP from 1212 ft to bottom at 6818 ft MD. M/U Baker cement head. Position 7" reamer shoe at 6814 ft MD. Set Liner Hanger. Release R/Tool. Shear ball seat. Commence 7" cement job.
opsReport.forecast24Hr: Cement 7" liner. Pressure test 7" liner. Set and pressure liner packer. POOH R/Tool. M/U & RIH 6-1/8" Drilling BHA. Slip and cut drilling line. Change out TDS wash pipe. Drill out 7" shoe track.

activity.comments: POOH 7" liner hanger R/Tool from 5557 ft MD to surface. B/O & L/D same.
B/O and L/D Cementing head, TIW and pup joint.

M/U and RIH 6-1/8" RSS/MLWD BHA to 132 ftMD. BHA : 6-1/8” PDC bit (HDBS GT64D, S/N 13581662, IADC M423, 3x9 & 3x10, TFA 0.416 in²), RSS PowerDriveX6 w/ 6” Stab CC, PD RT Comm SRX, LWD MicroScope w/ 6” Stabilizer, MLWD ImPulse w/ X/O sub, ADN VISION w/ 5-7/8” Stabilizer, XO Sub, 4 jts x 4” HWDP, 4-3/4” Drilling Jar, 4 jts x 4” HWDP, 51 jnts x 4” DP, 21x 4” HWDP, X/O. - Surface test RSS PowerDriveX6 with 200 gpm/300 psi, OK.

Pressure test 7” ZXHD liner packer.
Attempt #1*: Close upper VBR. Pressure up to 300 psi, holding. Pressure up to 3300 psi. Pressure drop to 1700 psi in 5 minutes. No leak at surface. Pump 8.5 bbls. Returns 5.5 bbls. Lost 3 bbls.
Attempt #2: Close middle pipe rams. Pressure up to 300 psi, holding. Pressure up to 1500 psi, pressure stabilized at 1200 psi in 5 minutes. No leaks at surface, at BOP and no fluid return at 9-5/8” x 13-3/8” annulus valve. Pump 3.5 bbls. Bleed back 3.0 bbls. Lost 0.5 bbls.
Attempt #3: Close middle pipe rams. Pressure up to 300 psi, holding. Pressure up to 1500 psi, pressure stabilized at 1200 psi in 10 minutes. No leaks at surface, at BOP and no fluid return at 9-5/8” x 13-3/8” annulus valve. Pump 3.7 bbls. Bleed back 3.2 bbls. Lost 0.5 bbls.

Close BOP. Reverse circulate 2x string volume at 300-100 gpm, 950-300 psi. Collect 60 bbls contaminated SOBM into IBC tanks. Maximum weight 13.3 ppg. Open BOP. Circulate hole clean long way at 500 gpm, 750 psi.

Set 7" ZXHD liner packer. - Pick up R/Tool string 12 ft (to expose packer setting dog sub above PBR extension). - Slack off slowly and tag 10 Klbs at TOL to confirm the dogs have been activated. - Rotate 20 RPM, slowly set down 100 klbs at TOL. Observe pakcer setting indicator pins sheared at 51 klbs. - Hold 100 klbs weight for 5 minutes while rotate 20 RPM, 9-12 klbs . - Stop rotation, release torque slowly. Pick up to neutral weight.

Commence 7" Liner Cement job : - Pump 60 bbls of 11.0 ppg Spacer at 6 bpm, 530 psi. - Mix and pump 47 ppg of 15.8 ppg G-neat slurry, 3 bpm, 220 psi. - Cement unit flush surface line with 2 bbls 10.0 ppg SOBM. - Drop dart plug. - Cement unit displace with 10.0 ppg SOBM at 6 bpm, 310 psi. - After 90 bbls displacement, reduce to 3 bpm, latch dart plug to shear 7" Solo Plug at 2600 psi. - Cement unit continue displacement with 10.0 ppg SOBM at 6 bpm, 760-850 psi. - After 140 bbls displacement, reduce to 3 bpm. Final circulation pressure 650 psi. - Bump plug from 650 psi to 1200 psi after 159 bbls displacement. - Pressure test 7" liner to 3300 psi/ 10 mins. Good test. - Bleed off pressure to zero, confirm float holding. Bleed back 2.7 bbls. - CIP at 8:00 AM.

Set 7" x 9-5/8" Liner hanger as per BHGE Engineer : - Release 1.5" phenolic ball and chase with 3 bpm. Ball landed after displacing 88.3 bbls. Increase pressure to 2000 psi once ball landed, held for 10 min. - Bled off pressure to 1000 psi. Set down liner weight + 40 Klbs, confirm liner hanger has set. - Increase pressure to 4200 psi & hold 2 minutes to activate DOBS. Bleed off to 1800 psi and pressure dropped to 0 psi. - P/U 3 ft from neutral weight, confirm running tool has been released. - New PUW 215 klbs. New SOW 195 klbs. - Set down 55 Klbs & circulate with 250 gpm, 530 psi. - Unable to rotate liner after release R/Tool due to reaching maximum allowable torque limit 13 kft-lbs.
7" Weatherford reamer shoe at 6814 ft MD. RA pip tag at 5597 ft MD Top PBR at 5557 ft MD.
R/U and P/T surface line to 5000 psi for 5 mins, OK.
Circulate condition mud to have YP 18 with 250 gpm, 430 psi, 20 rpm, 6-8 Kftlbs. PJSM for cement job while circulate condition mud.

L/D Baker cement head. M/U TDS. Apply 500 psi in the string. P/U string and observe pressure drop, start pumps to circulate possible cement away from TOL. P/U string a total of 36 ft to position bottom R/Tool stinger out of TOL. M/U side entry sub and FOSV. Connect hose diverting returns to flowline and IBC tanks.

RIH 7" Liner on 5-1/2" DP from 6369 ft to 6908 ftMD, got tagged 10 Klbs. - Wash down last stand with 150 gpm, 280 psi. - Filled up string every 10 stands. - Running speed 3 min slip to slip. - Drift all pipe with 2-7/8" rabbit. - No losses.

Rack back last stand. P/U & M/U 1 single 5-1/2" DP and 15 ft pup joint. M/U Cementing head preloaded with 1.5" phenolic ball and Pump Down Plug. Wash down with 250 gpm, 430 psi but still unable to move further. Ream down from 6808 ft to tag bottom 8 Klbs at 6818 ftMD with 250 gpm, 430 psi, 20 rpm, 6-9 Kftlbs. - PUW 200 Klbs, SOW 185 Klbs with 250 gpm & 20 rpm. - PUW 226 Klbs, SOW 178 Klbs with no pumps.
Pull back 4 ft off-bottom and position 7" reamer shoe at 6814 ft MD.

opsReport.sum24Hr: RIH 7" liner on 5-1/2" DP from 6369 ft to 6818 ftMD. M/U cement head. Position 7" reamer shoe at 6814 ft MD. Set liner hanger. Release R/Tool. Shear ball seat. Cementing 7" liner. Set 7" ZXHD liner packer. Circulate hole clean. Pressure test 7" ZXHD liner packer. POOH liner hanger R/Tool to surface. B/O Cementing Head. M/U 6-1/8" RSS/MLWD BHA to 132 ftMD.
opsReport.forecast24Hr: RIH 6-1/8" RSS/MLWD BHA. Slip and cut drilling line. Change out TDS wash pipe. Displace hole from 10.0 ppg SOBM to 9.0 ppg DIF WBM. Drill out 7" shoe track. Drill and log 6-1/8” directional hole.

activity.comments: Perform choke drill. R/D side entry sub and FOSV.
Drill out plugs, float collar, landing collar and shoe track from 6725 ft to 6814 ftMD and clean rat hole to 6818 ftMD with 260 gpm, 1350 psi, 70 rpm, 8-11 Kftlbs.

Drill 6-1/8" directional hole from 6818 ft to 6873 ftMD/ 4921 ftTVD. - FR: 250-270 gpm, 1400-1650 psi, WOB 5-12 Klbs, RPM 120, 9-12 Kftlbs, - Inst ROP 20-40 fph. Avg ROP 14 fph. - MW 9.0 ppg of RDIF. No loss - Sweep 15 bbls Lo Vis + 15 bbls Hidens pill as required - Backreamed prior to connection. Take survey before connection - BG 2 units. No peak gas - Lithology: 100% Limestone - Metal collected from ditch magnet = 350 gr

R/U side entry sub and FOSV. Line up cement unit to drill string and annulus. Close upper VBR. Pressure test 7" liner packer with 9.0 ppg DIF WBM. Staging up pressure to 2500 psi. Pressure drop to 1880 psi in 10 mins. Pump 3.5 bbls. Bleed back 3.0 bbls. Lost 0.5 bbls.
Surface cement sample already hard. No leaks at surface line, BOP, HP riser and Unihead.
Offline: continue cleaning flow line and shakers.
Slip and cut drilling line. Change out TDS wash pipe.
RIH 6-1/8" RSS/MLWD BHA on 5-1/2" DP from 2645 ft to 6546 ft MD. No restriction entering TOL at 5557 ft MD.

Continue RIH 6-1/8" RSS/MLWD BHA picking up 4" HWDP & 4" DP from 132 ft to 2645 ftMD. - Shallow test MWD/LWD at 1307 ftMD with 245 gpm/1460 psi, OK. - P/U & M/U 29 jts of 4" HWDP & 51 jts of 4" DP from deck - Drift 4" tubular with 2-1/4" drift

Wash down 230 gpm, 1750 psi from 6546 ft. Tag TOC at 6725 ft MD.
Pump 30 bbls base oil and 30 bbls hi-vis WBM. Displace with 9.0 ppg DIF WBM with 3x mud pumps at 260 gpm, 2450 - 1300 psi. Clean flow line, choke and kill lines, choke manifold, mud gas separator and trip tanks. Fill up with surface system with 9.0 DIF WBM.

opsReport.sum24Hr: RIH 6-1/8" RSS/MLWD BHA from 132 ft to 6546 ft MD. Slip and cut drilling line. Change out TDS wash pipe. RIH to tag TOC at 6725 ftMD. Displace hole from 10.0 ppg SOBM to 9.0 ppg DIF WBM. Pressure test 7" liner packer. Choke drill. Drill out shoe track to 6814 ft MD. Clean rat hole to 6818 ft MD. Drill and log 6-1/8” directional hole from 6818 ft to 6873 ftMD/ 4921 ftTVD.
opsReport.forecast24Hr: Drill and log 6-1/8” directional hole.

activity.comments: Drill 17-1/2" directional hole from 2790 ft to 3548 ftMD/3451 ftTVD. - WOB: 6-20 Klbs, FR: 1060 gpm, SPP: 1580-1650 psi, RPM: 40,TRQ: 8-16 Kftlbs. ECD: 8.66 ppg. Bit Krevs: 512 - ROP ins: 40-170 fph, ROP avg: 32 fph - Got total loss at 2822 ftMD. Switch drilling fluid to seawater and activate flooding pump to keep annulus full with seawater - Sweep 50 bbls HiVis pill twice per stand or as required - Backream full stand before connection, repeat backream if erratic torque observed especially at sliding interval and hard stringer - Sliding: 46%, rotating: 54% - Take survey after connection - Last survey at 3452.9 ftMD, 3357.07 ftTVD, 21.27° inc, 285.24° azi Ct-Ct: 7.05 ft (3.1 ft below, 6.33 ft right)

opsReport.sum24Hr: Drill 17-1/2" directional hole from 2790 ftMD to 3548 ftMD/3451 ftTVD.
opsReport.forecast24Hr: Drill 17-1/2" directional hole to TD. Pump Hivis and circulate hole clean. Wiper trip to shoe. RBIH to bottom. POOH 17-1/2" BHA.

activity.comments:
Jet and pull all legs free in sequences with 1200-1400 gpm, 180-250 psi. Disconnect jetting hoses. Raise all legs to mud line.
Note: Leg penetration in WHP-D was S 113.4 ft, B 114 ft, P 112.2 ft Lead towing boat AHTS Canopus. Port-aft towing boat AHTS Ruby, tied up to tow line @09:30 Stb-aft towing boat AHTS Carina, tied up to tow line @09:50
*** END OF SD-1 WELL OPERATIONS AT 12:00 HRS, 15 OCT 2021 ***

opsReport.sum24Hr:
Jet and pull legs free. Raise all legs to mud line.
